1553322221211121212111111.title: She's in this too.

15533222212111212121111111.content:
"Hello!" Noland shouted in his panicked fit.
"Crane..." you heard the voice on the other end call out, "...Crane. Give me... Crane."
Oh crap... that's Lydia's voice!
"Lydia!" Noland recognized her voice too, "are you alright?! Where are you?!"
"Give me... Crane..." she repeated.
"C'mon honey! Snap out of it!" the troubled officer tried to talk sense into her, "I trained you better than this!"
"Crane... now."
"Fight dear! Fight!"

Hunter ushered his head to you, "You better give the phone to Crane." Noland shrugged, but handed the phone to you. Question is what could you say to her?!

"L-Lydia? It's me," you tried to sound calm, even though you were almost as scared shiteless as Noland!
"Alone..." she spoke like she was in a trance, "you alone..."

"Quick! We have to trace the call!"
"Why? I dont think we can just DRIVE down to Hell!"

You ignored Huntersen and Leanansidhe and tried to continue with Lydia. No, it was clear you werent talking to Lydia anymore.
"What do you want? What do you want me to do?"
"Come alone..." Lydia spoke, "no one else." Figures Atropos's family would want to meet you by yourself!
"Where do you want to meet?" you had to ask. Both Huntersen and Noland leaned in to listen.

"Where we... first met..." she gave you such a loose answer! Yet, you were incredibly quick to decipher it. Where you and Atropos (at least you assume it was her) first met. Doesnt really mean anything to the other two, cuz technically you never told them where you two met.
"Come alone. No one else.. or mother eats her."
"Wait! How do I get there?! Where-"
*Click!* *Beeeeeeeeppp.* Too late. She hung up.

"Where did you two first meet?!" Noland was quick to question you.
"Do you have a map?"
"Here!" he handed you a map, "now tell me!" As much as you wanted to tell him, the walls had ears. No doubt she's still listening in. For his sake and his daughter's, you had to keep it a secret.

"I'm sorry," you regretfully tell him, "I dont wanna risk your daughter's life." Too bad he wouldnt take no for an answer.
"You have to tell me!" he ordered, "I cant just leave her behind!"
"I'm sorry... I need to go."
"ANSWER ME NOW!"

"Noland!" Huntersen once again intervened! He grabbed Noland's shoulder. Noland was about to pry it off, but one quick look in his eyes and a moment of silence made him give up instantly. Deep down, he knew he couldnt risk startling the Reapers.
"Beat it, kid!" Huntersen told you as Noland lowered his head, trying to hide the tears.
"I'll save her, I promise!" you gave him what was clearly an empty promise before rushing out of the office. They didnt follow behind.

You stared at the map as you followed the directions on getting there. Fortunately for you, the police department wasnt very far from that little frat house that started your whole adventure. You only had to pass a few traffic lights and one unfamiliar neighborhood, and judging by the rain suddenly starting up again, it looked like you were on the right track. The atmosphere was getting gloomier, you saw less and less people around, more barren empty houses, and eerie quiet besides the sound of the rain drops. DEFINITELY on the right track.

And there it was. The frat house. Or what used to be the frat house. Seemed like only yesterday that it was packed full of people, ranting and raving and cranking loud music and smoking all kinds of unsmokeable substances! Now it's ruined. The paint's worn out, the windows smashed and barricaded, graffiti all across the walls, old yellow police taped left all over the grass, toilet paper hung up on the tree, and several cigarettes and beer bottles left behind on the ground and an realtor ad STILL hung up on the garage door.. After the incidences began, NOBODY would want to hang out at this place anymore. Prices slashed to the point where realtors would lose money trying to sell it and no takers.

You walked around the pile of leftover trash and put your hand on the knob. Sure enough, the door was opened.

Sure enough, the inside looked even worse than outside. The whole place was trashed. Couch torn to shreds all across the room, tv smashed in with a lamp, the place reeked of expired booze, the carpet was STILL wet and sticky, and ants were crawling toward the rotten beef you see in the kitchen. Dreadful. Nobody ever bothered to clean up...

*Slam!*

Suddenly, the door slammed shut behind you! Not only that, the room got dark! It was like that darkened area Atropos dragged you and your crew in last time!
Only this time, you saw huge purple eyes suddenly open up all across the walls! Each eye staring deeply at you... blinking every once in a while!

'She's here,' you think to yourself.
And as luck would have it, there was Atropos, standing right in front of the door you came in, giving you that eerily carefree smile that's still burned in your memory!

"What'd you bring me here for?!" you questioned her. She didnt say anything. She just smiled. You were just about to repeat yourself when you saw another Atropos standing in front of the doorway to the kitchen! Then there was another blocking the stairs. And another guarding the one window that wasnt barricaded! You shoulda expected an ambush! Now you just lost your means to escape!

"Ahem!" you heard Atropos's voice behind you. You turned your head to FINALLY greet the head Reaper responsible for your misery yet again! Still carrying that stupid scythe of hers disguised as an umbrella. "Youre late," she spoke with a smirk.

Now that youre here, you wanted to get this over with!
"Where is Lydia?!" you got right to the point!

Atropos merely giggled, "Is that all you have to say to me? Hunter, I thought we had something special! Didnt all those times we spent together mean anything?"
You just glared and repeated, "Where is Lydia?!!"
Atropos sighed, "You've only met her for less than an hour and already youre her little knight in shining armor?" She started pacing around you. "If I were to kidnap the daughter of some high and mighty tribal king of some arabic land whose name you cant even pronounce, would you blow off all your life savings to hop on the fastest plane to get to me?" she then stopped pacing around and put a hand to her chin, "hm... to be honest, that WOULD be kinda flattering. Wasting all that effort and money for me!"

"Dont flatter yourself, bitch," she lowered her hand from her chin the second you called her that 'b' word! "I came here alone like you demanded. Now let Lydia go!"

She snickered at you, "Hah! I never said I'd let her go just cuz you came!" she then glared, "Not after you screwed me over the last time, especially!" Damn! You shoulda known it wasnt gonna be that simple! Lydia is now the bargaining chip!
"Your little trigger happy friend is just FINE," Atropos assured you, "none of my sisters want her dead anymore than I want YOU dead." Her umbrella morphed back into a scythe, "However, I'm not as cheery and patient as they are. And 'mother' is even less patient than me... especially when she's hungry!" All the purple eyes on the walls widened as they gazed toward you! You could a faint growling to match the ragefilled eyes!

You didnt have much choice. For your new friend's daughter's sake, you had to comply.
"What do you want?" you asked.
"First of all," she raised one finger, "I'm getting kinda tired of referring to that... THING that spawned me as 'mother'. Since you gave ME a name, would you be a dear and give her one, too?"
"Are you serious?"
"Mama... din-din!"
You groaned, "FINE! Nyx! Her name is Nyx! Happy?!"

Judging by the intrigued smile, she was. "Nyx... goddess of night. Mother of the Moirai!" The eyes on the wall softened their widened glared. "That'll work just fine. Better not let the big sisters know where it came from. Then THEY'LL want names, too!" Like hell youre naming all thousand of 'em! And something told you that naming these things is a bad idea...

Still, Atropos wasnt done! "Second," she raised two fingers, "Youre my official counter again! And we're starting RIGHT back to 1!"
You gritted your teeth, "So you can kill my mom again?! HELL no!"
Atropos rolled her eyes, "No, unfortunately not her. Because you intervened, you imbalanced the scale and now she's off the list. Chances are the next souls I have you spot will be nobody you ever met in your life."

"Why do you want me to do this?"
"Duh! Cuz you can see the numbers, stupid!" she tapped her forehead!
"No!" you correct yourself, "I mean why are you after these people? What is the point of this little death-hunt?"

She gave you a cold COLD stare. Colder than all the other eyes in this room. Is was the same fierce stare she gave you when you told her you didnt want this job!
"THAT is none of your concern!" her cold, dark voice matched her cold, dark stare, "now do we have a deal or not?"
"But wait! I need to-"
"DO WE HAVE A DEAL?!" she raised her voice and repeated, "...OR NOT?!"

155332222121112121211111111.content:
Author's Note: I wrote this chapter on an Android phone. Despite some errors I hoped you guys emjoyed this chapter :)!

You pretty much had no other choice. You were getting tired of innocent people dying for their selfish reasons. What's worse is that one of those innocent people actually tried to help you and now his daughter's life is at stake! Not only do you need to return the favor to the man that helped you,you also have to find out the truth.You had to find out why they're making you pick out the people who gets to die,and also why they're interested in you and only you.

You slowly raised your head back up and stared at Atropos,who is staring at you with a smirk. She kmew what your answer was but being the sick bitch she is she wanted you to admit your defeat.

"So what's it going to be Hunter?"Atropos spoke,breaking the silence.

"Are you going to accept the deal,or are you going to let the foolish man's daughter die?". You took a deep breath.

"I accept the deal...but only if I can see right here right now that Lydia's safety is guaranteed. And that you swear not to go after her or her family"you replied with a stern voice. Atropos glared at your request,but for some odd reason. She seemed obligated to do it.

"Alright,I'll let this one little request pass. Only if you promise to return the promise later." You paused for a moment,pondering at what she wanted. You didn't want her to change her mind at an instant so you simply nodded. Atropos smiled and stared at her sister guarding the stairs. Her sister than walked up the stairs and into the room at the top. After what seemed like forever,Atropos's sister walked out with Lydia. She seemed fine despite her arms being tird up,but you knew she was terrified. She walked down the stairs and cut the rope binding Lydia's arms. Lydia immediately ran to your side and wrapped her arms around you. Poor girl...all because of you she almost died....


"T-thank you Hunter"she cried"t-they were going to do horrible things to me!". Jesus what the hell were they trying to accomplish by killing her!?

"It's ok,don't worry about it. You have to get out of here though. Tell your father to not call me or look for me anymore. You got that? I promise you they wont harm you if you do that." At least...you hope they wont...

"HEY! Do yourself a favor and scram! Unless if you want to meet mothrr again I can arrange that"Atropos shouted,making Lydia release you from her arms. She looked back at you one last time and ran out of the house. Good,at least she's safe...

You looked back at the reapers starung daggers at you. Especially Atropos,who you think is probably staring at you the hardest out of all of them! What the hell do they have in mind now?

"Now that she's out of the way"Atropos spoke,with the same scary smirk she had on her face since day one."I think it's time for your initiation". Initiation? What initiation?! That question was soon answered the momemt they...
155332222121112121211111111.title: A Sacrifice For Those Who Have Fallen.

1553322221211121212111111111.content:
Your eyes widened with shock, horror, horror, and shock when you saw each one of those Reapettes whip out branding irons out of nowhere! You could see each one of them burning red hot and smoking with anticipation of branding something! Sadly, there were no cows around... and you wouldnt be surprised if all of Nyx's little girls were into kinky shit!

"Oh mother of God!" you gasped. Atropos grins at you with squinted eyes. All of her little sisters grinned with the squinted eye expression. Even the eyes on the wall squinted the same way!

"Oh Nyyyyyx..." Atropos called out to her 'mother', "would you kindly hold the snitch still?"
"!!" just like last time, a huge set of jaws appeared from below and clamped down on your lower torso! It wasnt tight enough to pierce skin... just tight enough to keep you from moving as Atropos and her sisters approached you! Despite being terrified of the pain that's about to come, you remind yourself that you did this to save Lydia. You kept your promise to that cop who rescued you earlier. His daughter is safe thanks to you. All it cost you was a couple of branding irons. A couple of scorching hot branding irons that are about to roast your flesh like a barbecue!

You tried to hold the urge to scream... at least until the irons come in contact! You could feel the intense heat just being near them!
"LET HIM HAVE IT!!" Atropos shouted as her purple eyes enlarged in anticipation.
*SSSS!!*

You were just about to shout in horror, when you realized you didnt feel a single iron. Each one literally went through your body, like a ghost! But you were quite confident it wasnt an illusion, because you felt something deep DEEP within you felt the intense burn! You could almost hear a faint scream in agony... maybe it was your soul? Whatever it was, it was obviously something terrible if it came from Atropos's ilk!

After several seconds of listening to that faint scream of sheer excruciating pain, Atropos and her sisters finally pulled their branding irons out of you. The jaws below you open, releasing your body, then sinking back into the floor. You patted yourself, trying to feel any burns or singes... there was literally nothing. Then what the hell did they do to you?

"Well... look at the big boy!" Atropos giggled, "didnt even flinch!"
"What did you do?" you asked her.
"Nothing you need to worry about," Atropos smirked as she pinched your cheek, "provided your obedient." Just assume that you DONT by any means wanna know what it does! Assume the worst if you rub this Reaper the wrong way.

"Alrighty, party's over, girls!" Atropos tells her sisters, "you can all go home now. Buzz off." And just like magic, the darkish gloomy hall of eyes vanish without a trace along with her sisters. At least THAT's out of the way. You sighed and headed for the door.

"Not you, Hunter!"

"SSSS!!!" you flinched like mad when Atropos grabbed your shoulder! Her hand was incredibly cold!! It also emitted bad chilling vibes that even your soul itself could probably feel! Touch of Death, perhaps?! By the time she let go, you fell to the ground and twitched for a little while!

"You are not off the hook yet," you stared at her feet walking circles around as you fought back the urge to foam at the mouth, "I hope you realize that because of your so-called 'act of heroism' earlier, those 9 people that were fated to die have just died for nothing." The part of your mind that wasnt paralyzed was cringing from that fact. Worst of all, Atropos was upset at you for the wrong reason! "I was THIS close to fulfilling my goal! THIS close! I woulda finally been liberated from my annoying big sisters and that THING once and for all! I couldve finally been MY OWN Reaper... with MY OWN rules... and MY OWN name... until you screwed it up!"
Something told you she was telling you more information than she shouldve, but the rest of you was too frazzled to register a response.

"So before we get started on the new #1," Atropos stopped and looked down at you, "I think you owe me a favor. A HUGE favor!"

The frazzling sensation finally stopped and you pulled yourself up off the ground cuz you dare not let HER help you up!
You wanted to smart off at her, but she was more than capable of smacking the taste out of your smart mouth!

"What?" you groaned, "what do you want?"

You loathed seeing that smirk on her face as she answered, "I want... no... I DEMAND that you-"
1553322221211121212111111111.title: She got a touch... a touch too much!

choices: Take her out to a fancy restuarant!
15533222212111212121111111112.content:
Those last eight words rang in your ears for what seemed like hours but in reality it was only a mere second. Out of all the things that she demanded,you were more shocked to hear that from someone like HER! You know that its crazy to have to pick out which people are going to have to die,but a date with a reapette?! What the hell are you going to do with a reapette?!?

"P-pardon Atropos?"you asked,shivering at her answer once more. She simply smirked and step toward you slowly. You simply started to step away from her as well,fearing she may touch you again.

"You hear me,you are going to treat me to a night on the town! And I mean I want to be spoiled!"Atropos shouted,making sure that you do not forget her demands.

"Oh you've got to be friggin kid-"you muttered until you backed up into a wall and Atropos quickly dashed towards you and stopped until her face was a mere couple of inches away from yours causing you to hold your breath fearing this is the end of it. She simply grinned as she stared deeply into your eyes,making sure that you see the reflection of your terrified face to remind who who's bitch you are.

"Unless of course your parents can be numbers #1 and #2,that would be a GREAT and FAST way to start off"she threatened. You clenched your fist and glared back at her. Clever bitch...You stopped and took a deep breath,reminding yourself that you have to figure out why she is making you do this and how you can put a end to it before things get worse!

"Yes mam'..."was all you could say. Atropos backed up from you and smiled at you. You sighed in relief and stared at your feet,but it was far to early to think that your in the clear.

"Well?!"Lets get going! We don't have all night!"Atropos interrupted your moment of peace. Damn...right the reapette. You looked back up at her and saw that she has completely changed her appeal! She was wearing black earings,while wearing a black silk dress with black heels. She was wearing purple lipstick,along that her dress didn't even cover her chest that well! In fact she looked gorgeous!

"W...wow Atropos..."you stuttered,still awing at the amazing sight you,although,some people do believe that death is a beautiful goddess...you only wish that they weren't that evil...Atropos smiled and gave a little twirl.

"I'm glad you enjoy this Hunter"she said,but then a small glared appeared on her face. Oh boy..

"And just to let you know,if either your so called "demon hunting friend" or police officer and his little twerp side kick show up they WILL be the first to go!". You prayed that Lydia told Noland and Huntersen to stay away from you,if they intervene,not only will they be killed but they're the only people that you can depend upon to help you find a way out of this! You slowly nodded,just so you can show that you understand. Luckily,she was pleased,and she walked towards you grabbing your arm,leading you to the door.

"Great! Now then,off to empty your wallet and max up your credit card!"Atropos cheered. Whoppdy fucking doo...

You stepped out of the house and started to head towards a certain part of the city that you know that is close to where Atropos made you meet. You could say that the atmosphere of the district is calming and relaxing,you know that there are some restaurants and bars that you can take her to that you used to take your ex-girlfriend to when you two were dating. It was a pretty good relationship until you two decided to end it,you kind of have feelings for her but you know that it is time to move on. Oh if only you two were together so you could have focused on her rather than partying that lead to seeing this evil bitch...

After what seemed like a half hour,you and your "date" arrived to the city. You and Atropos stopped to observe everything.What surprised you was that people actually noticed Atropos standing right next to you! It would only make sense,people would think you were crazy taking an imaginary girl with you! Luckily,you can forget that reapette was standing right next to you holding your arm as she observed everything around her.There were street musicians playing acoustic sets,a river where there is a merry traveling on the waters,tables outside of restaurants and bars.This part of the city always brought you warming memories.It was pleasant,it made you forget your dating the grim reaper herself out on a date that depends on your very life! Atropos noticed that you were distracted from her,and decided to give you a little reminder,by making you feel that could sensation against her fingertips! You shivered and looked at her,grinning your way.


"So where are you going to take me to Hunter?I mean you are the man treating a lady,how do you plan to satisfy her?I do hope you have enough money to do that"Atropos said with a smirk,that is a good question. What ARE you going to do???
15533222212111212121111111112.title: Driving In Your Car,I Never Never Want To Go Home.

choices: Go over there and talk to him.
155332222121112121211111111122.content:
You could only imagine the look on your parent's faces when they find out all the excessive charges on the cards they oh so generously loaned to you. However, you didnt wanna take Atropos out to eat, because GOD only knows what reapers consider to be adequate food sources. You whipped out one of the Visas and said with a hard, HARD groan... "Let's go shopping."

You shudder at seeing the damn curse of your life hop up and down with excitement and clap her hands! The cute satisfied smile she was giving you made your stomach cringe. Also, the fact that you had the gall to watch her boobs bounced when she hopped made you puke mentally.
"Oh Hunter!!" she pretended to swoon, "you really know how to treat a girl! Let's see if your platinum card knows how, too!"
"You sure you dont wanna just kill me?" sadly, Atropos ignores you and locks elbows with you and drags you down the shopping center! She dragged you across plenty of stores you believe are the best places for girlfriend’s to waste their boyfriend’s money! Clothing stores, Hot Topic, Cinnabon, flower shops, music stores, the who shebang-bang! You even stared in horror at the jewelry store. No way in hell you could afford ANYTHING that place offers!

THANKFULLY, she walked past the jewelry store. Guess she’s not big on bright shiny things (*COUGH!*Flashbang*COUGH!*). But you know what she IS big on?! Hot Topic!

“Ah! This one would look good on me! So would this one! And this one! Not this one, but I like the color. Eh, maybe sis’ll like this.“ And man was she quick to pull shirts, skirts, gothic dresses, lip stick stripped socks, a handbag, little bows and collars off the shelf and into your shopping cart! You raised an eyebrow when she dropped a box of condoms into the cart!
“Why the hell would ya need THOSE?”
Atropos merely snickered, “As if YOU would need to know…” What was THAT supposed to mean?!
Anyways, the total rang up to about $200. You groaned as you tossed your leftover birthday money on the counter and waited for your change.

Next was the Cinnabon. Fortunately you were hungry too, so you didnt object to buying two caramel pecanbons. Then you went to Jamba Juice to order some ‘healthy’ fruit drinks. Yep… youre buying DEATH a health drink.
“I’ll take an original Banana Berry,” you order then turn to Atropos, “what’ll you have?”
She casually answered, “A Penis Shooter.”
“A what?! What the hell are you-”
“Ok, one original Banana Berry and one Penis Shooter!” you did a double take when the cashier reacted just as casually! That drink exists?! Probably part of a secret menu or something. “Will that be all?”
You squinted in a disgusted expression, but nodded.
“Total comes to $31.17” $25 for a friggin Penis Shooter?! Good lord! No wonder Atropos wants it!

As if it werent bad enough, as you enjoyed your drink, Atropos took one sip of hers, cringed at the awful taste and spit it out!
“UGHH!!” she groaned and tossed her drink in the trash, “this crap is nasty!”
“Then why did you order it?!” you objected.
She wiped her mouth and cracked a grin, “Just to see the look on your face!”

Next was the music store. She bought one of every single CD in the Heavy Metal section… and one Adele CD. Cost ya around $300 and the clerk looked at you strangely when you paid by credit card, but the transaction went through and you were yet another step towards being poor.

Atropos clinged to your arm sweetly as the two of you casually walked, knowing you were loathing every second of it.

"So THIS is what a 'first date' feels like!" Atropos said with glee, "for the first time in my life, I finally see myself as a girl... instead of some inhuman scary ghastly soul keeping drone of some other scarier ghastly soul keeping monstrosity." If she wasnt making your life miserable, you'd actually feel sorry for her.
"Then is this night almost over then?"
Atropos just squeezed your arm tighter. MUCH tighter. You felt no blood circulating to your arm as she squeezed!
"Nope!" she smiled, "you havent even begun to spoil me! We still need to see a movie, go to a danceclub, maybe a fancy restaurant, watch the firework display, then spend the night at a fancy hotel!" UGGGGHHH... "...THEN we look for the new number 1."

On second thought, youre in no hurry to end this night.

"Oh look! A bar!" your 'date' pointed to a nice looking pub, "do you drink, Hunter?"
You wanted to smart off to her, but then you remembered the LAST time you had a drink: the first night you met Atropos! "Not anymore."
"I dont either," she replied, "but I've been wanted to try at least ONCE in my life! Let's go get plastered!"
"That's ok, why dont we-GOD DAMN IT!!" you screamed the second she poked your exposed neck with her chilling fingertip, "FINE! FINE!"
"That's a good boy."

You gritted your teeth as you walked through the door with Death by your side. As predicted, you got several drunkards staring at you weird-like... but not because of Atropos.
Against your better judgement, you walked right up to the bald fat red-bearded bartender and kept a straight face.
"Aintcha a little young tah be caught drinking here, kid?" the ginger fat man of irish descent asked you. You just sighed and pulled out your drivers license, revealing it to him. He stared at it for a few seconds and then said, "Arright, boyo. What'll ya be havin?"
"Ask HER," you pointed to your 'girlfriend', who smirked at you.
"Ya might wanna find us a seat," she told you, "it's gonna be a while."

It was SLIGHTLY revealing that you got at least a moment to yourself if just a few minutes to find a table. You found a nice one at the very end of the room just aside the jukebox. You sat in your chair and waited. This might take a while.
Not far away from you, you saw a much older gentleman sitting all by his lonesome staring sadly into his glass. He wasnt crying, but that's probably because he already had. Just staring at him made you feel worse.

You recognized the guy. He was the man who was crying when the cops came to question you back at school. Mr. Mocherie. Your late dean's widower.

"Goddamn it," you muttered quietly, "why here?" The guy is probably still hurting. And who could blame him? His wife's dead... and YOU were the one involved in her death. #8. You still remember the last words you shouted to her, 'FUCK YOU AND GET OFF MY BACK!'
You couldnt just stand there and stare. You had to talk to him. You at least owed him a small chat.

Then again, how could you talk to the husband of the woman you killed? The innocent woman who was just concerned of your well being and who you repaid by shouted in her face and turning your back on her?!
You felt like scum... but just sitting there in awkward silence didnt make you feel any better!

15533222221.title: The warrior or the worshiper.

155332222211.content:
The blow to the head you took as you rounded the corner would make resisting impossible, trained or not.

Your dimly aware there are four of them, one with brass knuckles. They close in on you, snickering, eager to finish the beating there about to give. And then, she arrives. The tunnel vision is going black as you see the figure step into the group, hauling there progress. It's back is facing you, but somehow you get a sense of femininity form the new comer. You can just barely make out long flowing White Blond hair, and a pair of heavenly white wings. Nothing else really sticks about her attire.

You try to stand, to help her, but your body won't respond. The one with the brass knuckles swings, and you see movement that the injury won't let you follow, but as you black out finally, your certain you heard a loud snap and saw him fall.



____________________________________________________________________________ __________________

You awaken in a hospital bed. Your head hurts, and so does your throat. The Doctors tell you your lucky you were brought in straight away. Some hours later you've got meds and water in you and you feel better, and that is when she steps in.

Her clear blue eyes have a power too them, a confidence seldom seen. Her bust is impressive, defiantly at D cup, maybe bigger. Her body is built like a very, very serious personal trainer. Senued tensile strength, and not an ounce of fat anywhere except her chest. And it was the White Blond hair you remembered form when you lay on the pavement.

But it was her height that really shocked you. She had to be seven feet tall! At that size and with that build she might very well be the strongest person you knew. And the wings? Those, where very real, and were certainly not just your brain, scrambled form the blow, adding random things to the process.






(Next choice is who you are, who she is, and what you look like and what she's wearing. )
155332222211.title: Valkyrie

choices: You admit you don't believe a word she said about demons coming after you
You pointed out that your current situation is similar to some fiction.
1553322222111.content:
"Hello, (Name). My name is Mist." The winged beauty stated as she sat down on the chair besides you.

"What's with the..." You said, as you gestured to her wings.

"I am a Valkyrie, sent to protect you." Mist said. "And you are currently the only human able to see or interact with my wings."

"Um... Thanks for earlier, I guess...?" You replied.

"Oh, don't thank me just yet...." Mist said, with a bit of an evil grin, one that no doubt struck fear in many beginner-valkyries. "Due to how you were with those four, I need to give you some 'special' self defense training when you've fully recovered."

"I thought you were sent to protect me?" You said, as you sat up in the bed.

"Yes, and a way to protect someone is by teaching them to defend themselves from threats." Mist replied.

"So what are you trying to defend me from?" You ask, hoping to change the topic.

"A number of female demons." Mist explained. "Due to the stars you were born under, if any of the female demons mate with you, the resulting child will be the Anti-christ."

"Huh. So I just have to make sure I keep any female demons out of my pants, right?" you replied, remembering a various number of Manga with a similar plot.

"Yes." Mist explained. "I must admit, I was expecting you to not believe a word I was saying..."
1553322222111.title: Valkyrie bodyguard

1553322222112.content:
When you locked eyes with her the silence seemed to last for an eternity until she pulled a small book out of one of her pockets. It was bound in leather and seemed quite thick and well worn. A feather pen adorned the side but she didn't pick it up, instead flicking through the pages so fast it looked like a blur before stopping. Her eyes scanned the page before snapping the book shut and looking at you.

"Are you well (Your name)?" She said pulling a chair from beside her and pushing it to the foot of your bed where she took a seat. How did she know your name? You couldn't bring yourself to answer. The shock of seeing your saviour (let along seeing that she had wings!) left you speechless. She looked you over quickly and smiled, a more genuine and heart-warming one you'd never seen. Only accentuated by her flawless face, her eyes also played a part feeling like some of her confidence was flowing into yours.

"Yes..." You say watching as she grabbed the feather pen and hastily scribbled something down. It didn't have ink on it though. Although that wasn't nearly as strange as her wings which captured your attention. They were a pure white and seemed almost hypnotic to you as you took in every detail of them. Although that was cut short when she stopped writing.

"So, I understand that you were attacked yesterday?" She said like a detective reading a crime report. She was there why did she even need to ask? "Do you have any idea why they would have attacked you?"

"Money I guess." You said trying to shrug. A look of annoyance spread across her face and she muttered something under her breath before continuing,

"My name is Gabrielle. I hope you understand what I am?" She said looking you in the eyes again, this time the gaze was more expectant and made you uncomfortable.

"An angel?" You said sheepishly making her sigh.

"I suppose in a way I am but that's not the name of my kind. I am a Valkyrie." She said much to your disbelief. With the wings you could believe Gabrielle was an angel, but weren't Valkyries warriors? You know, spears, shields etc. She could obviously tell what you were thinking from the amused smirk she wore.

“Yes, we used to be like that before customs changed so we changed to adapt. I could adorn it if you want, I was simply going for a less intimidating look for our first meeting… also the fact that armour is less then common in this age.” She said with mild amusement while motioning to her casual wear.

“Wait, so other people can see you?” You ask confused.

“Yes, why?” She said tilting her head as though it was obvious.

“What about…” You motioned to her wings, you knew you weren't dreaming but maybe the meds were getting to you.

“Oh, these?” She asked fanning them out a bit in one graceful motion. “Yes they’re real, but only those with Odin’s blessing can see them.”

“Wait, so I'm blessed?” You ask, you had trouble believing that with the bad luck you’d been struck with in the last year. This assault was one of the more serious occurrences. “Why?” You were sceptical, what had you done that deserved the attention of a god? You didn't know much about him but you learnt enough in history to understand what that meant. This time however, she didn't answer instead averting her gaze for a few moments before turning back to you.

“You should be discharged later today, I saw to it that your healing would progress faster.” She said proudly almost as if you had never asked the question at all. Then again you had the feeling that if she didn't want to tell you, you’d never have a chance to get it out of her anyway. So you sigh and continue.

“So what am I supposed to do? Just go back to leading a normal life?” You say sarcastically.

“Yes, I'm glad you catch on so fast.” She said, clearly oblivious to the sarcasm dripping from your voice. “Of course there will have to be some changes made…” She said quietly.

“Like what?” You raised an eyebrow, what didn't she want to tell you?

“Now that you are aware of the supernatural, you’ll be more attuned to it and the creatures will become more attuned to you.” She says before noticing the steadily increasing look of hesitation on your face. “Of course with Odin behind you few creatures would dare offending him by attacking you. Some may even get on your good side to increase their standings. Only followers of other gods would mean harm, and those that can see a blessed person are precious few.” She quickly followed up easing your tension somewhat. Just how long ago had you become blessed? And how dangerous were these 'precious few'?

“Why couldn't I see them before?” You ask carefully, thinking back to any time you may have seen one.

“Because you simply weren't aware of them, and because of that they never bothered to look your way. Except for one” She said trying to explain as best she could although you couldn't hear the last part. You were still left slightly confused as she began writing something again. She tore the page out and handed it to you. You looked on it to see a strange symbol and above that a phone number.

“If you need me just call that number and keep the paper on you. It should stop all but the strongest beings trying anything foolish and will alert me to it.” She said preparing to leave.

“Wait! You’re just going to leave?” You say honestly hoping she’d stick around to protect you. Although you knew she was going for a good reason your brain just wasn't listening.

“Yes, the longer I stay here the more likely you are to be noticed. Don’t worry, I’ll be around and you'll see me soon. Just ignore what you see and you’ll be fine.” She said walking out the door before you had a chance to do anything. Now that her warming aura was gone you felt truly alone. Just what was out there waiting for you? You at least knew one thing, you'd protect that piece of paper with your damn life. You sat there for the next few hours, trying to figure anything else in the ad breaks between the shows you watched from your bed. None of this made any sense but you weren't going to give up like that.


You barely even notice when a confused nurse made her way into your room.

"Um Michael?" She asked reading her clipboard. The way she snuck up on you made you jump.

"Yeah that's me." you say hoping she has something that can take your mind off this.

"Your release papers have been signed... we just need to do some tests and you're free to go." She said, probably confused how you recovered so fast. You don't know yourself but you have a good feeling that Gabrielle was the one that made that signature. After a few standard health checks you find that you're completely recovered, something that confused the nurse beyond belief. She said your estimated recovery time was at least a week. You just said you lived a healthy lifestyle and left it at that. "Someone left you a spare change of clothes at the front desk, here they are." She said producing a small bundle that looked quite impressive. The logos on it and other pictures were all done in Norse style giving the impression of top quality craftsmanship. Looking at all the writing and the like you wondered if it actually served more of a purpose then just to look impressive. She handed you the rest of your belongings, which was mainly your wallet.

You got a lot of strange looks on your way out. Some of the doctors and nurses whispered behind your back making you all the more eager to leave. Once you got the bus stop you didn't have to wait long. You had enough change left to pay the ride back to your apartment, most of which was uneventful. You did find it strange though that you kept seeing things on flick in the corners of your vision. You must have looked crazy flicking your head around everywhere to try and catch a glimpse of it. When people started giving you weird looks you stopped hoping that it was just your imagination. If not you hoped that you didn't draw attention to yourself.

When it came to your stop, you moved faster then you ever had before to get off the bus. Your apartment was a block away, but at your panicked speed you made it there in record time. Running up the stairwell you fumbled with your keys before throwing the door open only to slam it shut moments later. Your breathing became shallow and rapid as only now did the exhaustion get to you. You never were an athletic person. Slumping to the floor you try to forget the day. Why had any of this happened to you? What was that thing on the bus? You just made more and more questions until you weren't sure if you were sane any more. Suddenly you feel something furry rub against your leg. Your head snaps down expecting some monstrosity...

But its just your cat, Amber (Named after her eye colour). She was a strange cat you adopted from a shelter. She was quite vicious at the start as you had been told she was found beaten and unconscious on the side of a road. That was what you assumed made her so anti social. At the start you felt that she was dangerous for some reason, something subconscious told you to stay away, but your pity for her won in the end (even though it landed you numerous scars). Over time she had warmed up to you and became your companion, always there to soothe you after the day. You'd always feel safe around her and whenever you were woken up in the middle of the night by some noise or something, she'd be off for a minute or two and then be back with the disturbance gone.

Somehow you never questioned it, hell you still didn't. You were just glad for her company and warming presence. She was good at telling when you were distraught and helped most in those times. You stroked her soft fur with a smile on your face.

"Thanks Amber..." You said and you could have sworn you saw understanding in those eyes but you just dismissed it before going to watch some TV. She followed behind you, and hoped you'd never find out that she was the creature that noticed you...
1553322222112.title: Door number 2.

155332222212.content:
You shook your head in disbelief. Youre still shaking your head in disbelief. You've been shaking your head in disbelief for hours now. Anybody who was you right now would be shaking their head in disbelief. Some would be shaking their head until it falls off! This little miraculous discovery is something you'd find in Weekly World News... or at least in a small brief article a larger article regarding President Obama being a killer robot who emits hidden hypnotic waves in his deep monotone voice during his speeches!
It all started with your mom and a bunch of your her relatives going on a little camping trip in the woods! Since you were getting disgusted by one of your uncle Bert's many stories regarding his ingrown toenail, you decided to kill some time by taking a nature walk into the woods.

Sure it's believable you'd find an unconscious woman lying in the middle of the forest... but a woman with white, birdlike wings?! The poor woman had golden blonde hair that would be the envy of all your blonde cousins, bright peachy skin like out of those skin cream commercials, and a long flowing white dress that despite lying in the middle of the dirty ground, is somehow incredibly clean! Not a drop of dirt on it! The atmosphere around her felt incredibly warm and intoxication. She had a wondrous aura about her no one you've ever met in your life felt. Of course, that's not nearly as shocking as the white feathery wings sprouting out her back!

Winged woman or not, she was still in need and needed medical aid! You tried to gently wake her up, but no good. She was fast out... and had a nasty scratch in her arm. She's bleeding green blood?!
Fortunately, you had a miniature first aid kit on you. You quickly addressed the wound, disinfected it, and applied bandages over it. You get pulled out a washcloth, soaked it in the river and put it on her forehead to cool her fever down.

You wanted to carry her back to the others but she was a little too heavy for you to handle (Those wings must weigh a ton!). You shouldve found a nearest phone and dialed 911, but for some reason you didnt wanna leave her side. It almost felt like you would be punished severely if you tried!
Instead, you stood there staring at the winged woman and shook your head in disbelief.

"...Mmm....mmmnn...." she started coming to. She slowly opened her eyes, giving you a brief glimpse of shining golden eyelids in the middle of blackened eyeballs! Those didnt look any fancy contacts you've ever seen before!
"Unn.....huh?" Her black eyes widened as she gazed into your soul! No, seriously it honestly felt like your soul itself was compromised by her stare!

*WOOSH!*
"WHOAA!!" you fell over the split second the woman bounced up on her feet with just a flap of her wings! You stared up at her in awe as she gazed down at you, spreading her wings out! Th... theyre real!!

That's not a happy glare she's giving you.

"Uh...wh....y...e...."

"Mortal!!" her shout nearly the earth around her! Her voice sounded like it was of nobility... and demanding, "you have just desecrated the sanctity of an angel in training!"
"W...wha..."
"Putting your filthy impure hands on an pure celestial is a capital offense!" she demanded, "one punishable by immediate death!" D-D-DEATH?! What's she going on about?!

"Whoa whoa whoa! Calm down!" you got up and tried to calm her, "relax, I'm only trying to help-!!!" You felt an invisible force freezing your body! You couldnt move anything below your neck! She's... she's not human! "Wh...what the hell-"
"What your language in front of a celestial mortal," she warned you. You complied.
"S-Sorry! What the HECK are you?!" She squinted her eyes as she stepped closer to you.

"You cannot possibly be this dumb, mortal," she coldly spoke, "even the lowliest creature on the face of this planet knows an potential angel when it sees one." ...A...An angel?! But angels are make believe! They dont exist.

Wait. 'Potential' angel?!
"Uh... POTENTIAL angel?"
She put a hand to her chest... her ruby ring on her ring finger glowed, "I am Alexandria. Soon to be St. Alexandria. I was in the middle of an important mission advised to me by my superiors... before I was rudely interrupted by the likes of you." You interrupted an angel's mission to be a certified angel?!

"N..Nice to meet you, Alexandria," you tried to sound friendly, "I'm-"
"Jonathon Carpenter," she already knew your name!
"H-How did you know my name?!"
"Fool, dont you remember what I told you?!" Oh right, she's an angel... er... POTENTIAL angel! "I know more than that about you. Son of Helen Carpenter and Michael Carpenter. Middle child of two sons and a daughter." She squinted her eyes, "...atheist."

Oh dear! Worst time in the world to still be doubting religion! All those religious folks were right. You'd know the power of God just by FEELING it! Sadly, praying for mercy would be useless at this point...

Alexandria looked at her bandaged arm. The arm you so kindly nursed to health.
"Did you do this to my arm?"
Aint no use lying to an angel trainee.
You nodded, "Yes. It was bleeding. You were out cold, so I was just trying to nurse you to health. Is it wrong that I helped you out?"

"Yes it is, Mr. Carpenter," Alexandria told you, "as I said before, tainting an angel with a mortal's touch is a high offense. While your... vague act of chivalry seems admirable, the crime was still done." Crime?! For touching an angel?! How shallow is that?! Would she rather just be left to die?!

Thankfully, you werent gonna be meeting your creator yet.
"I'll overlook this capital offense just this once," Alexandria 'mercifully' told you, "however, youre now known to me, Mr. Carpenter. Interfere in my mission in ANY way, I'll see to it you regret your action for TWO eternities!" JESUS CHRIST, WHAT DID YOU DO?!!

With that, the invisible force faded away, freeing the rest of your body from her angelic grasp! Alexandria turned around and walked off. Where she was going, you probably didnt wanna know.

'Geez, what an ungrateful bitch,' you thought to yourself... and immediately hoped she couldnt read your mind!

You know when youre not wanted. You'd better head back to the others before theyre worried sick. Hopefully, you wont have to worry about that stupid angel trainee again.

Then again, ever since she brought up her 'mission' to become a full fledged angel, part of you got a little curious. Despite it being suicide, you thought about following that angel to see what this mission of hers was about. Then again, you remember what Alexandria said about interfering with her mission! You definitely shouldnt mess with one of Heaven's pupils!

Maybe you should just forget her and head back to camp with the others.

...Or maybe you should try following that angel trainee at a safe distance and see what she's up to?

"Jonathan carpenter my student had met with you today correct?" you nod your head at this fear jumps threw you when a large sword apears in her hands and is pointed in your face you try to back up but yet again your frozen the sword vanish and the angel start to laugh. what the hell? 1553322222121.title: Fuck the angel.

choices: Not long later, the family wakes up...
An hour passes... and no one wakes up!
15533222221211.content:
Just when it was about to get good, everything vanishes! Heaven, Micheal, the lucky mortal and his angel harem, the sparkly, glittering buildings... all vanished without a trace! You shoulda known it was too good to be true. Then again... angels?! PSTT!!

You guess it! A friggin dream!

However the split moment you woke up, you see a pair of narrow eyes gazing at you at point-blank range! You were spooked out of your mind, but in a way, so was this stranger!
Her pink eyelids narrowed in her blacked eyeballs similar to Alexandria's and her jaw dropped in fright!

"WHAT THE-"

"EEEeeeekk!!" she shrieked as she leaped off of you... and... floated in the air!

This woman... er... girl... midget(?!) was small! Literally half your size! And very pink, too. She had pink hair, pink eyes, work a pink dress with hearts stitched on it, pink lipstick, a pink heart-shaped birthmark on her cheek, pink boots also with hearts on it, even had pink wings sprouting out of her back! Her aura seemed similar to Alexandria's, but not nearly as strong... or threatening! Mainly fragrant and inviting.
You both stared at eachother practically scared out of your wits. Well, you probably werent as scared as she was. She was shaking and shivering as he was floating in the air!

"U-U-u-unbelievable!!" she put her hands to her cheeks and spoke in a high-pitched, "how could a mere mortal break out of the love-trance?! Nobody breaks out of the love-trance!" Love-trance?! ....THE HAREM HEAVEN DREAM!!!

"Y...You?!" you jumped out of your sleeping back and approached, "You created that dream?!"

"Uh... um... uh... "
"What are you doing in my tent?" you question the short pink angel then looked down, "...and did you just try to unzip my pants?"

"Um... d-dont be scared, mortal," she tried to tell you in a comforting tone as she flew closer to you, "just lie back down and receive your bliss like a good-"
"Get away from me!!" you shout, not trusting her and not wanting to break the angel touching rule for the second!

"YIKES! I KNEW THIS WAS A BAD IDEA!!!" the pink mini-angel shrieked and flew out of your tent!
"HEY! WAIT UP!!" you tried to give chase of your dream molester, but she was way too fast. You expect no less from a celestial entity.

"Aw great..." you sighed, "MORE of them?" Great, one wanted to kill you and the other wanted to get in your pants. Does this mean the third's gonna try to eat you?! You werent gonna find out, cuz you were not going back to sleep. Fortunately, it was nearing dawn. Not much time before the others wake up. To kill time, you decided to chill out at the main table where the rest of your family would soon be having breakfast.
You wait patiently staring at the mountains in the distance. You a few trees, a couple of birds, a few deer... a bright blonde angel surrounded by the birds and the deer!
"!!" you quickly turn away, hoping she didnt notice you. If that was Alexandria, like hell you'd want a reunion with her!

You pretend you dont notice the bright aura in the distance and head back to your tent. You pull out some hot cocoa mix from your bag and brew yourself up some hot cocoa. It didnt taste bad, but it wasnt enough to quell your uneasiness. After all, it was just yesterday that you begun to question your outlook on life. Now that you know that angels exist, what are you supposed to do? Convert? To what?

Come to think of it, you never saw angels before in your life! Why are they here NOW?!
Great, now you lost your appetite.

You'd best stop thinking so hard about it for now.
You set down your cup of cocoa and wait for the rest of the family to get up...
15533222221211.title: Question Your World

155332222212111.content:
Not long later, the family wakes up! Here came your grandma Janice, then grandpa Rufus, then uncle Bert, then aunt Lucy, then cousin Stu, then uncle Roy, then the other cousin Stu, then Stu's wife Trisha and their baby boy little Stu, then great uncle Albert and his wife Stu (short for Stuella), and finally your brother, sister, and finally your father, who no doubt didnt wanna be here. (eldest brother was away on a business trip... in Iraq).

"Well, lookee here, Rufus! Little Johnny-boy's up with the chickens!" your grandma spoke in that thick southern accent that you can always spot in a crowd!
"I can see that, Janice!" remarked grandpa in a rather grizzled throaty voice, "what you doin up so early?"
"I... couldnt sleep," was all you could answer as you sipped your cocoa, trying to soften the thought of angel existence.

"Eh, dont be worrying yer head off over a bad night," quipped grandma, "we still got loads to do out here to kick it all down. Which reminds me, we gotta start breakfast!"
"I gots the pancake mix!" said grandpa, "HEY BERT! Where ya keepin' the bacon?!"
"In the mini fridge next to my dermatophytosis cream." Whelp, now you lost your appetite, too!

Anyways, the rest of the family gathered together at the camp table chatting amongst each other while grandma was prepping some pancakes and bacon on the camp stove. Uncle Bert went on about the time his doctor was completely flabbergasted to discover a brand new strain of fungus growing on his toe. Everyone had a laugh except for you and your dad who was keeping to himself pretty far away from the family. No doubt he felt like the odd one out.

Because you wanna leave him left out and he seemed like the most sensible person to tell your story to, you walked on over to him.

"Hey... dad?"

"What is it, John?" he turned his head and asked. You couldnt just flat out TELL him that you saw angels last night. It's way too bizarre. But you did know ANOTHER way to tell him.

"I... I had a weird dream last night," you explained, "I dreamed I saw an honest to goodness angel (in training) lying unconscious on the side of the road." He raised his eyebrow at you, but you continued, "I nursed her to health, but she threatened to kill me because apparently touching her is a cardinal sin or something."
"I... see."
"Anyways, she knew everything about me," you continued, "about my name, who I am, my family... even that I'm an atheist! She knew EVERYTHING!" You didnt wanna tell him about the angel harem dream and the angel rapist in pink, You had to maintain a sense of dignity in front of your father.

"Did it scare you?" he asked.

You nodded hard, "Yes. I mean what if theyre others out there that knew just as much as she did? What if some came after me? And what if they knew I broke the rule about physical contact with an angel?!" Oh crap, you almost panicked there! You tried to keep your cool, but after thinking about it, those are very good questions! One of them DID come after you!

"Well, youre an atheist arent you?" then your dad had to bring THAT up, "since you dont believe in the existence of a supreme being, you dont believe those angels are real, do you? It was all just a bad dream." Your dad had a good point, but it made you very uncomfortable. That little incident is making you question your outlook on life.
"Well... it all seemed so real," that was the best you could come up with.

Your dad smile, "Maybe it's just God's way of telling you he wants you to go back to church."
You sighed hard, "I'm not going back to church, dad."
"Alright, that's fine," he sighed, "God has given you a free will after all. But if youre scared, I'm sure he'd be willing to lend you an ear." You had no response to that. If God exists and those were really angels you saw, who better to comfort your ills than the Big Guy in charge?

For now, you couldnt take this anymore. You needed to clear your head. "I... I think I better lie down,"
"Youre not gonna have breakfast with your mother's folks?" your dad asked.
"No, I already lost my appetite," you said, "I'm just gonna rest for a bit. Thanks for listening."
"No problem," your dad said, "...the offer's still on the table if you wanna come with me to church next Sunday."
"I'll think about it," normally that'd be a lie. But after this episode, you probably should.

So you head back to your tent wondering how youre gonna handle the fact that angels may in fact exist and that your entire view on life itself may be WRONG. DEAD WRONG. Speaking of dead, you really really REALLY hope you never have to get on Alexandria's bad side ever again. Heck, you hope you never have to see Alexandria again. Finally you reach your tent and you a deep breath and exhale and head inside and what the hell is that letter doing on your sleeping bag?!

It was a fancy looking letter with plenty of glittering heart designs on it and little pictures of cupids. It had a nice fragrant perfumey smell to it, as well. On it, the words 'TO JOHN' were written in carefully hand-written purple ink with a heart replacing the O in JOHN.
"Ugh... this should be good," you muttered as you opened the letter.

Despite the cutesy handwriting, you felt bad vibes as you read it.
'DEAR JOHN, IF YOU VALUE THE LIVES OF YOUR FAMILY, PLEASE MEET ME AT THE LAKESIDE WEST OF WHERE YOU FOUND ALEXANDRIA. COME ALONE. AND DRESS NICE. PREFERABLY SOMETHING EASY TO UNDRESS.

-LOVE, MEDEA' There was even a big pink kiss imprint by her name.

"You gotta be fucking kidding me," you groaned. Well, so much for trying to clear your head. You wanted to toss that letter in the campfire, but she mentioned your family's lives. It sounded like either a threat or a warning. Either way, youre worried.
Then again, it could just be a trick. Or a trap.

Should you go?

The thought of fleeing flooded your mind, but so did the fact that this was a friggin angel you'd be attempting to flee from! An ANGEL! You might as well run from a tornado or a tsunami! It cant be done.
You swallowed hard and believed that keeping on Medea's good side was the ideal choice. Since she was generous enough to answer so many questions that a lowly mortal like yourself probably shouldnt know the answer to, it's only fair to answer one of her questions.

"Well... after the 'nice' encounter with Alexandria, I had a crazy dream... and it sorta involved... um, is that KY jelly?."
Medea squirted a dab of jelly substance from a squeeze tub, "Just wanna make this moment memorable for the both of us. Keep talking!" Jesus! You turned your head away, not wanting to see her rub that sex lube between her legs in prep of the divine fucking!
"Er... a...anyways," you continued, "I dreamt I was in Heaven and I met Micheal."
Medea's pink eyes widened, "Micheal?! You seriously dreamed about Micheal?! The same Micheal I was just talking about earlier?!"
You nodded, "I... I think so..."

Medea tilted her head and looked up at you with more interest, "And what did she say?"
You gulped, "Well, she talked about what Heaven is like... and her brother, Lucifer... andthatshefallenformeandwantedmetobecomeheroneandonly."
"What?!" Medea squeezed out a HUGE glob of sex jelly in lieu to hearing that, "did you just seriously say what I THINK you said?!"
"Er... what did you think I said?"
"That Micheal, OUR Micheal, our one and only Lady Micheal, the 1st of 786 daughters of YaaHuuWeeHaaHaaWeeHuuYaa, has fallen for YOU?!"
You sweated bullets as you get her fragrant aura become a little more fragrantly than ever, "Um... yes..."

"Impossible!" Medea practically shoots you down, "Our Micheal took a vow of celibacy long ago. A vow to even this day she refuses to break out of fear that the impure child she makes with an impure mortal man becomes the Anti-Christ!" Holy crap!
"F...For reals?"
"For reals!" Medea assures you, "it's gotta be the work of a demon! Are you just sure you didnt like accidentally sell your soul or prick yourself and bleed on a devil or anything?"
"I am dead sure!" you tell her, "I would remember something like that. And something like that has never happened before!"

Medea squints her eyes, "Maybe that demon wiped your memory so you wouldnt remember the deal you made with it. Oh well... let's knock boots to be safe!" And yet again, she's back to trying to 'purify' you!
"Er, s-sorry, but I'm gonna have to pass," as if she cared what you think. By the time you were thinking of a good excuse, you suddenly heard jazzy music playing in the background.
"This is for your own good, John," Medea assures you, "I'm pretty sure you can imagine what would happen to you if a demon keeps a grasp on your body for too long."
"But I'm awful sure I dont have a demon uh, grasping me!" you say to her to no avail. The lakeside was vanishing before your eyes and turning into what looked to be a big pink dimly lit boudoir setting! Oh dear, who suddenly cranked up J-Lo's 'If You Had My Love'?!

"Um.. aw man, look at the time! I better get heading back before the others worry I-"
"Time doesnt matter here!" Medea said with such a cutesy smile, "it's put to a halt in my realm! We could go at it for the next millennium and not even a second will pass outside!" Aw crap! She can freeze time too?! She really is an angel!!

Before you could so much as blink in shock, you felt a sudden draft! You looked down and immediately find yourself standing buck naked in front of a deviously grinning midget angel who is somehow gripping every bit of clothing you had on in the palm of her hand!
"Give those ba-EEEESSSHH!!" bad move! The split second you touched her, you felt an incredibly strong surge of energy rush all through your body! You felt your veins pump blood at incredible speed throughout your body until it passed through the vein between your legs! All the pent up blood circulated to your crotch, hardening your member to the point where it hurt! It was the biggest, stiffest, and most painful erection you have ever felt in your life! You worried that the tip was gonna burst!

"WH-WHAT... HAVE YOU... DONE TO ME?!!" you groaned in excruciating pain!

"Dont worry," Medea assures you, "it's a perfectly natural side-effect from Angel's Lust! It only stings for a few seconds. Then youre gonna feel REALLY good!" Thankfully, she was right. The pain quickly subsided, but the oversized erection still remained! Multiple thoughts raced through your fragile mind which ranged from 'Is this permanent?!' to 'Is this seriously gonna be able to fit in THAT little twerp?!'
"L-Look, s-seriously! Cut this out!" you pleaded with her, "this could lead to irrepairable damage to my body doing these kind of things!"
Medea gave you a cutesy frown, "Oh c'mon. Stop acting like such a high and mighty prude! You should be thankful I'm offering myself to you. Love from a bonna fide angel is something lowly beings couldnt begin to DREAM of experiencing! Not to mention..." she added with a cute wink, "...the demon wont be able to make a virgin sacrifice out of you!" That's a good point-WAIT NO IT'S NOT!
Perhaps it's another side effect from 'Angel's Lust', but sex with this little angel doesnt seem to sound so bad. As you ponder it, the positives seem to outweigh the negatives. Sure you'd be breaking the 'touching' taboo, but maybe it doesnt count if she OFFERS herself to you willingly! She's probably doing this to sate her own lust, but it'd not only sate yours too, you'd be 'purified' and feel absolute pleasure not of your mortal realm! It was getting a little difficult finding a downside to this whole rape.

Her pink eyes gleamed with joy, as if sensing you were caving in!
"YAY! Youre finally giving in to the light!" she literally jumped for joy, "now... SUBMIT!" With just a touch from her palm, you felt her will knock you over and you land on a big soft pink heart-shaped bed! Before you could even think about whether or not you should give up, Medea had already leaped on top of you and straddled your waist like an celestial cowgirl!

She squeezed both your hands tight as you felt your crotch about to press against hers!
You sweated a bit as you locked eyes with her at point blank range. 'Here goes nothing,' you think to yourself.

"Now..." Medea's grin widened as she announced, "LET THE PURIFICATION BEGIN!!!"

It wasnt technically 'sex' you had with Medea. You cant have sex with a hurricane. You cant have sex with an erupting volcano. The intense rush you felt throughout it felt less similar to sexual pleasure than to surviving a death-defying feat! Granted it was a turn-on, but the turn-on you feel when you leap out of an exploding building or jump Springfield Gorge or summon Exodia the Forbidden One! Heck, it reminded you of the rush you felt that one time you FINALLY finished that long ass 20-page essay on Why God Doesnt Exist in your sociology class! Safe to say, it was an A+!

Whatever you had with this miniature angel of love, it was an experience. The split second your tool entered her, you were showered with loads of adrenaline coursing through your body! Sweat dripped down every pore and your veins bulged out from this intense exercise of unearthly proportion! The heat from the rest of your body was far more extreme than the one from your crotch due to the heating sensation of the sex-jelly! You wrapped your burning hot arms around the angel's back, twitching against her smooth gentle skin. Even the feathers of her wings felt invigorating to touch as they constantly vibrated on instinct from your touch!

You shuddered just feeling the tips of Medea's fingers running against your bare chest! Even though her nails scratched slightly deep into your skin as you thrust, the pain was a mere mosquito bite in comparison to the rush your body was feeling! Man, who woulda thought your first time would be THIS awesome! There was no way you could have sex with a normal human girl at this rate! Medea had just raised the bar!

With each thrust, you fed off more and more of the intensity with visions of soaring above the clouds and swimming through uncharted filled your mind. You could only imagine the face you were making as you gazed almost hypnotically at Medea, who was rolling her eyes back and gasping heavily, even moaning in some unfamiliar tongue! Just watching her squeen in ecstasy was a thrill itself. You literally saw big pink hearts spin around the two of you as you went at it.

Even after you orgasm, you didnt stop. You didnt even slow down the pace the tiniest bit! You kept on going, continuing your heart-pounding adventure! Who knows how long time had passed. You lost count of the number of times you came into her. It almost seemed like an eternity passed, but could very well be a second outside Medea's realm!
It was a long long LONG road, but the adrenaline was beginning to die down. Your body was starting to get tired. By the time the joy-ride was over, you were barely clinging to consciousness. With one final orgasm into the angel, you began to white out. You barely made out an exhausted smile on the pink angel's face before giving you a gentle but incredibly slobbery peck on the cheek.
Consider yourself officially PURIFIED.

"John?! John!!"

"Huh?" you suddenly wake up, feeling refreshed. You werent showing any sign of groggyness or fatigue getting up. It felt good getting up. Which was a plus, since you woke up back at the lakeside, but Medea was nowhere to be seen. Where could she have gone?
The only thing you have of her is a cute little pink lacey wristband around your wrist. A little parting gift, perhaps? It even had her fragrant scent on it. Perhaps that 'purification' mighta meant something to her? Oh man, Alexandria's gonna be PISSED...

"What are you doing all the way out here?!” you heard your father calling, “I thought you said you were just taking a nap in your tent!”
You got up and faced your dad, “S…sorry. I suddenly didnt feel like napping so I… took a walk out here to stare at the water.”

“That’s… unusual,” your dad said, “well, whatever. The others are gonna hiking up the hill. Hurry up and come on.” Odd. Earlier, you weren’t in ANY mood to go hiking or damn near anything else. But after being ’purified’ by Medea, you had a lot more vigor than you used to! A hike sounded exciting to you. You couldnt wait to go!

“Alright! I’m coming!” you shouted more enthusiastically than you expected!
