Trust Lucy and keep the deal
1553322222222222212222222212.content:
You turned around quickly and watched your surroundings, but you didn't saw anything strange. Furthermore, the feeling had disappeared. Sensing you had stopped, your little sister turned around and asked with a worried face:

'Michael? Is something wrong?'

'Not at all.' You smiled to calm her (and yourself) down and resumed walking. After you had dropped her at her school, you went to your own, to where you arrived ten minutes later. A new building, one which you had only seen a few times, stood high, meaning a whole new future for you. Yes, only six years of that future would be yours, but you had already decided to enjoy them as fully as you could, knowing that, after you had graduated, you would exchange your life and soul for your sister's, a deal that you wouldn't ever take back.

You walked through the hallways until you found your classroom. You entered, found your desk (which was next to the window on the last row) and sat, thinking about what you had lived the past few days. However, your trail of thought was soon interrupted by one of your friends, Josh. Josh was always the best of the year in all physical activities, and was in almost all of the sport clubs. He was tall and muscular, with short, straight, brown hair and blue eyes.

'Hey man! Come here and gimme a hug!' he said while doing so. 'I've heard your sister got better just the past Saturday! Man, I'm so happy for you!'

'Can't...breathe..' you muttered while tapping his shoulder. He was VERY strong.

'God, Josh, release the poor guy. Nobody deserves a death like that.' said another of your friends, Shin, appearing behind Josh. Shin, opposed to Josh, was and intellectual guy who always got top scores. He was about your height, with green eyes and shoulder length, straight, light black hair.

Josh released you and looked playfully at Shin. 'I'll let that one slip just for today!' he exclaimed. Shin gave him the same look and looked at you more serious. 'But, man, no kidding, good for you. We were very worried when we heard about Elisa, but seeing you act like... you were devoid of life, it was harsh. We didn't know how to cheer you up. Good to have you back.'

You looked at them, and with tears in your eyes, said:

'Thank you for everything, guys. Really, you are the best friends I could ever hope for.'

Josh put his arm around your neck and smiled. 'C'mon, don't go crying on us.' 'Yeah, wouldn't be good for ANY of us.' Said Shin, also smiling. 'Besides, now we finally are 7th graders! We have a new life ahead of us!' When you were about to reply, the teacher entered in the classroom and everyone went to their desks. The teacher was a middle-aged woman who seemed to have a way with booze. Hell, you coulda sworn you saw a hip flask sticking out of her red purse!

'Okay class, so I'm your English teacher this year, Mrs. Renard. And today there's a new student in this academy and in this class. Please, enter.' she beckoned someone to enter the classroom and you saw a stunningly beautiful girl entering. She had very long raven-black straight hair, and a perfect face. In fact, all of her looked like it was made to be perfect. You thought that her measures must have been 90-60-90.

'Introduce yourself, please.' said Mrs. Renard. The girl nodded and and faced all of you, and then said with a beautiful (as well!) voice:

'My name is Marie Laurent. I'm pleased to make your acquaintance.' she said in a formal way. Her name sounded French, or so you thought.

'Let's see... Marie, sit on that free desk.' She pointed... next to you, at your right!

'Damn, you're one lucky son of a bitch!' whispered Josh, who was in front of you.

She sat next to you and, during the next hours of lecture, didn't say one word, she just wrote something down on her notebooks every now and then, and not even during the lunch break uttered a word to others, besides the answers to the questions the other girls and guys asked her. When the bell rang, marking the end of class, she packed her things and went out of the classroom, but a piece of paper fell of her pocket. You grabbed it and opened the mouth to tell her what had happened, but she was nowhere to be seen. Judging that it wouldn't hurt you, you read it:

'Please, meet with me behind school when school is over.'

You wondered who would be the one supposed to receive that, but you kept on reading:

'To Michael Evans''

It was for you! But how did she knew your name? She must have memorized in the roll call. You wondered what could be the matter that had made her summon you after school, but your thoughts all said the same thing: a confession.

'No, there's no way.' But, just in case, you decided to go. Who knows? Maybe she would become your girlfriend.

You packed your things quickly and went behind the school, where you only had to wait a few minutes for her to appear.

'Good afternoon. I'm glad you came.' she greeted smiling.

Your heart started beating faster. She was very, very beautiful.

'Good afternoon. Wh- what did you call me here for?' you were VERY nervous.

'I'd like you to tell me one thing.'

'Wh- wh- what is it?'

'Would you...' you were expectant of what she would say next. '... please tell me about how your sister was saved?' Your heart stopped beating for an eternity, or so it seemed.

'It was... thanks to the doctors.' you said with your throat almost totally dry.

'No it wasn't. She should have died, and you know it.' her words were giving you fear and rage, but mostly fear.

'Who.. who are you?'

'My name is Fate. I'm here by God's orders to ensure that the flow of life that he has disposed in me goes without a fail.' SHE WAS FATE!? HOW IN THE HELL!? 'Well then. Will you tell me, or do I have to guess?'

You weren't about to say it, that was for sure. It was bad enough to be against God, but against God and Lucifer, you didn't dare to think about it.

'Well, I think it's time to start guessing. Who would be powerful enough to go against me? Not anybody can. It must've been a demon, am I wrong?' No, she wasn't. She was aiming her guesses the right way, and she saw it in your face.

'A demon it is, then. But, among them, who? There are many. But only one has taken a likening to go against me. Lucifer, the Fallen Angel, the Morning Star.' her voice was very cold, devoid from its earlier beauty.

You flinched when she said that, and again, she saw it.

'Poor you. Another poor soul tricked by a foul demon. But, do not worry. I can help you break her grasp on you. You just have to follow what I say to the letter.' For real? She had a way of breaking the deal? You didn't want to, but a part of you was listening with all its attention. 'It's very simple. You just have to summon Lucifer again, and break the deal. Then the correct flow of events will start playing.'

'What about my sister then?' you asked, fearing for her life yet again.

'She will die, as God has disposed.' WHAT!? She wouldn't save her!?

'No way! I'm not calling the deal off! I want her to live!' you shouted.

'Then, I'm afraid this is the only way of making you go the right way. I'm sorry.' she apologized as an unknown force left your body rock solid and unable to move! She began moving closer to your body, until her face was almost touching yours. She put her hands on your temples and you felt a surge of something that left you almost without breath.

'Hmm? A strong will you have there. Most would have already given up at this point. It seems the corruption of your mind is stronger than I thought. I'll have to use other means to achieve my goal.' she moved her face even closer and just as she was about to kiss you, you heard a familiar voice.

'Why are you tempting him?' you moved your head what little you could and saw Lucy, just as the last time, moving closer to the both of you.

Fate took a few steps back and, just as it came, the sensation of paralysis disappeared. Lucy came to your side and clinged to you. 'I'm the only one allowed to tempt him.'

'Lucifer.' said Fate. 'I was just about to freed him from your influence. This poor soul must not be lost to your deal.' Lucy smiled to this.

'I'm sorry, but he's not under my control. In fact, he was the one to put most of the terms to our deal. And in a very handsome way.' she blushed a bit as she said that.

'And why would he do that?'

'To give more life spawn to his sister, whom he loves very much, whom you wanted to kill and whom I saved!' she exclaimed. She was right. All you did was to save her. Everything.

'It was God's will that she would die a few days ago. He should respect it.' argued Fate.

'I don't think that logic works for an atheist.' countered Lucy.

'My, my. What a pity that you don't believe in Him. But that's fine.'

'It is?' asked Lucy.

'Yes.' Fate changed her attention to you. 'I will make you an offer. Break your deal with Lucifer, and He will save your sister's life, as well as your soul. You don't want your sister to be sad after you die and after she dies and sees that you're not on Heaven, now do you?' She was right about that. It'd break her heart.

'Do not listen to her!' shouted Lucy, looking at your eyes. 'She's the same one that God created and what was about to kill her! She was talking about having your sister dead only a few moments ago! Please, believe in me!' She sounded very sincere, but then again, she was the best lying. But she had a point. Fate certainly talked about your sister dying. What will you do? Trust Fate and risk everything, or condemn your soul to Hell and ensure your little sister's life?
1553322222222222212222222212.title: Fate's a Cruel Mistress

choices: Someone attacks you on the way home!
15533222222222222122222222122.content:
You looked at Lucy, who was still clinging to your left side, and stared for a long moment into her blue eyes. You gently pushed her a bit and, looking directly at Fate, walked a few steps towards her. You heard Lucy's voice behind you:

'No! Please, Michael, don't go! Please...' her voice trailed off. You walked a few steps more and stopped until you were almost in the middle point between Fate and Lucy.

'Fate.' you uttered that only word. She smiled and opened her arms, welcoming you, waiting for you. But you didn't move. 'We're done with our business, if it even can be called that. My deal with Lucy remains. I side with her. I believe in her. For all I care, you can disappear right now.' you said those words with a newly found confidence, the confidence to defy what you didn't liked; the confidence to defy what was already written for all of humanity; the confidence to defy God Himself.

'But why, poor soul? Don't you see that she is lying to you? That she is trying to trick you?'. she seemed genuinely confused. She must have thought that you would choose her side, as all that she had offered a similar deal had made.

'What I see and feel is that she saved my sister when she needed help most, and only asked in return a fair price, which I agreed to pay of my own free will. Meanwhile, your plan was to take her away from me to Heaven or whatever place there is before she had a chance to fully enjoy life. Lucy, or Lucifer, if you may, gave me a chance to choose, and I chose. I chose for her to live. And when I die, and the payment is complete, I shall be by her side, even while suffering the worst punishments of Hell, for my soul will be taken, but not her memories of me. I'll live on through her.' your speech finished with those words that now were the absolute truth to you.

'But, the same could be said for her. She could have lived on through your memories of her!' Fate desperately tried to argue.

'True, but that is something reserved only to me, right now. Only to a sinful person like me. That was my choice, those will be my consequences. Now please, turn back and go.' the last part was a plea. You just wanted her to leave you and your family alone.

Right when you had finished your speech, you felt Lucy (it had to be her, because there wan't any other being around that part of school) hugging you from behind, and a warm sensation that ran down and through your clothes. Could it be that... she was crying?

'I'm very sorry, lost lamb,' she interrupted your thoughts and you noticed that she had called you 'lost lamb' instead of 'poor soul', 'but I can't do that. My duty and being say that I have to kill that temptress' she pointed to Lucy, who was still behind you 'the moment I see her. I only had this chat because I wanted you to choose the right path for yourself, but it seems this demoness is too strong. I'll kill her and you'll realize the truth soon after. Please, move aside.'

'Yeah, sure. You actually expected me to do that?' you mocked her.

'Then, I'm afraid I'll have to do this. I'll try to harm you as less as possible. Please, forgive me in advance.' she raised her hand and muttered strange words, and the wind grew stronger.

'I won't let you!' you shouted and pushed Lucy, who was still behind you, out of harm's way, while you raised your arms and assumed a defensive stance to protect from the incoming attack. But it didn't worked. Instead, it seemed like the wind only hit you stronger, sending you against the wall of the school and making a few of your ribs break in the process. All of your breath was knocked out of you and you fell face first against the floor. Somehow, even with the injuries, you managed to turn around and tried to gasp for air, but all you did was imitate perfectly a fish out of the water. You stood on your knees and coughed some blood, which you wiped with the back of your hand. Then, you looked to where you were standing and saw Lucy, with all of her wings fully spread and horns sticking out of her head.

'I won't forgive you! I won't forgive you!' she repeated louder and louder very time until only a demonic voice came. A strange glyph appeared on the floor, red as the blood, and as an incantation began to flow out of her lips, the sky was covered with fire. After that, a white light blinded you and when you regained your sight, you saw the place where Lucy had taken you the night of the deal. At a single move of her hand, fire sprouted from the earth and burnt everything, Fate included. Even before that was over, Lucy moved her hand again an more fire fell of the sky right above Fate. When the element had finally disappeared, Fate's silhouette could be figured among the smoke.

When that had finally cleared, Fate appeared, with several burnings all over her once beautiful body, and her clothes (the school uniform, a white blouse with some red and blue stripes and a skirt with the same design) were almost completely destroyed, revealing the still perfect shape of her body. She had ragged breathing, and was on one knee.
But, even in her state, she smiled and said:

'You are stronger than I thought, Morning Star. No wonder why you were God's favorite until your failed rebellion. And I may have lost, but this is far from over. God won't allow you to interfere with this world's destiny any longer. The Governor has been watching us from afar, and will come her eventually. Even you, the first Fallen Angel, won't stand a chance against the Governor.' and with those words that inflicted fear upon you , she disappeared amidst a white mist. With another withe flash, you returned to the school grounds. And, when you were totally sure that there was no relative danger (you had Lucy near, and the Lady of Hell was always danger), you allowed yourself to lose consciousness.

You awoke at some warmth spreading all over your upper body, and soon you saw a green light that, as you could feel, was healing your broken ribs and a few bones that you didn't knew that were broken. The source of the green light seemed to see a combination of Lucy's hands and tears that were flowing down her face and fell onto your body.

'What...is happening?' you asked, still a bit weak because of that big hit. However, as low as your voice could be, Lucy heard it, opened her eyes in amazement and hugged you REALLY hard.

'Thank God you are safe! Thank God...' there was something that seemed of to you. Had she just thanked God for your well-being? Wow, she must've been REALLY worried about you.

'No, it's not thanks to God. It's thanks to you.' as her healing abilities went on, you were capable of speaking better. Her eyes opened again and she hugged you even harder. After a while, she let go and helped you stand on your own.

'Thank you,' she said with a smile that couldn't be but true, 'for believing in me. You are the first one to do that since Him. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.'

'In any case, I believed in you because you prove me you were worthy of that. It's all thanks to you.'

'Really,' she said, with a bit less of a smile, 'it was because of that that I... It doesn't matter right now.'

You tried to clear your thoughts and deal with a headache at the same time. Bad move.

'Oh yeah, one thing.' you remembered. 'You didn't seem to be on good terms with the idea of me taking up on Fate's offer. Why is that? I mean, I know we have a deal and all that, but if I broke it, you could just get my soul and then make another deal to another person. Why did you care?' you were really curious about that.

She sighed. 'At first, this was only going to be a normal contract, you know? I got your soul, you got your wish... A win-win. Then I'd make another contract, and another, and so on. But you,' she gazed directly into your eyes, 'you had to go and act all mighty for your sister's sake, didn't you? And you said to Fate herself that you believed in me over her, then you protected me... What could I do...but to fall in love with you?'

At that point, you did a double take. Had she just said what you thought she had said? You had managed to make the Great Seducer fall in love with you!? What in the Hell was happening!?

Before you got a chance to process all that information, she approached you and kissed you on the lips. Man, you had no words to describe how good tasted those cherry lips of her! It was beyond anything a human would surely get in their lifetime! Totally amazing!

She backed up a bit and then whispered:

'That was my first kiss.' and with only those five words, she made your blood boil, your cheeks burn and you could have sworn that they also made your nose bleed a little.

She giggled at the sight of you and stood there, a bit embarrassed.

'I love you. I would have never thought that I would fall for a human, but here I am.' she giggled again.

'You... love me? Why?' you certainly had a hard time dealing with that much info.

'I already told you, silly.' she laughed. 'Now, tell me: do you love me?'

There it was. The question. Did you love her? You certainly were grateful because of her help with your sister, but that was not all. A few times you were able to see her childish side, and you were sure that there was more than a mere affection to her. You loved her. It was the truth.

'I do'. you said, confident in your answer.

She smiled and kissed you again, and this time, her tongue entered your mouth and entwined with yours.

'Enough of this.' she said breaking the kiss. 'There will be time for this... later'. a mischievous smile was shown on her pretty face. 'Now, we have to prepare to deal with the Governor.'

'That's right. But who' s the Governor?' you were clueless about that.

'It's her Sumerian name. She's known as the Announcer, the archangel Gabriel.' An archangel was hunting you!? SHIT! You were really fucked!

'Let's go to your home. We'll discuss this further there.' she beckoned for you to follow.
15533222222222222122222222122.title: True Feelings

choices: Let's take a look at the other side, shall we?
155332222222222221222222221221.content:
"Alright, let's go. But, I think it would be better if you created a diguise for us. Just so that we don't attract, shall we say... "unwanted attention"."

"You're right about that but, why I don't just teleport us infrot of your home's door?"

"Well, I know that you probably alredy saw it but, I would like to go throug the park with you. I thought we could enjoy a moment of peace, even of a it is a short one, before the preparartions for the fight begin. Also, I thought that you would like for us to go throug a romantic place like a normal couple would do. Well, our version of normal."

*Giggle* "Yeah. The Lady of Hell and a human would be a very strange sight, right?"

"Indeed. But, I honestly don't care what other people think about us. You know that I love you and I know that you love me and that's enough for me."

When you finished saying that, she hugged you tightly and kissed you with a great deal of passion.

"Thank you, Michael. I'm glad to be you girlfriend.", she said blushing.

"You're welcome. Now, about that disguise..."

"Don't worry, I'll make something better."

"Okay. What are you going to do?"

"Wait and see."

She raised her hand a little and said hand began to glow and a with aura enveloped you. Within a few moments, the aura dissipated. You looked at your self and saw that you weren't any different than before. You were very confused by this. Then something ocurred to you. You smiled and, turning to Lucy, you asked:

"You made us invisible, didn't you?"

"Exactly! Now, we'll be able to go on our walk without a problem. Oh!"

"What is it? Something wrong?", you asked, worried.

"Well, don't you have to pick up your sister at her school?"

"Yes, but I was going to suggest that you located her and teleported her here."

"But, what about uor walk?"

"Well, you could make her sleep until we enter my house."

She smiled at you with a satisfied and konwing smile.

"It nice to know that my boyfriend is not only nice, but smart as well."

"You already had thought of a plan, hadn't you? You were testing me."

"Yup! And I'm quite satisfied with your answer. Admittedly, that wasn't what I had in mind, it's even better.", she said giving you a peck on you cheek.

That little kiss made you blush a little.

*giggle* "You look so cute when you blush! I love it!"

"Well then, shall we go, hun?"

Blushing, she said:

"Yes. Let's, dear."

You took her hand and the two of you began walking through the park. The sun was beggining to set and until now, the wank had been uneventful but, when you were about, halfway, something began to worry you. And Lucy could tell so.

"What is it, Michael? What's worrying you?"

You didn't wanted her to worry so you tried to lie to her.

"Nothing, Lucy. It's nothing."

Unfortunately, you forgot who you were with.

"Please, Michael. I'm the best liar that here is. I can easily tell when someone lies to me."

*sigh* "Alright, alright. I was just wondering how to tell my family that my girlfriend is Lucifer, the Lady of Hell. I mean, mom will more than likely, freak out. As for my sister and my father, Im not sure what their reactions will be."

"Hmm... I see, then wouldn't it be better if we didn't told them? Should I change my apparence or assume another form?"

You thought about this. You didn't wanted her to change anything. The only reason you would want her to change something about her, even if it was a little thing, would be if you were ashamed of her, Which you're not.

"No. Please, stay the way you are. I like you just the way you are, Lucy. Besides, my mom might freak out, but I'm sure she'll end up accepting you. And so will do my sister and my father."

"Michael..."

"I'm not ashamed of being your boyfriend, nor do I regret any of my choices... - you held her close to you and, as the sun left the sky completely and the gave place to the moon, you kissed her with all the passion that you could muster. - ...my love."

You resumed your walk and, while it was uneventful, you both enjoyed it a lot.
155332222222222221222222221221.title: You go to your house.

choices: Let's take a look at the other side, shall we?

1553322222222222212222222212211.title: Apology and repairs.

155332222222222221222222222.content:
You wanted to help your sister. More then anyone could ever know, but at least she'd go somewhere nice after she died. You on the other hand would only be delaying her death and would suffer all eternity for doing so. You'd never thought like this before but with Lucifer coming to tell you that she can save your sister you have no trouble believing in heaven and hell any more. You don't want to anger the ruler of hell, as you see she begins to become frustrated with how long you were taking. She clearly thought that you would choose your sister over self preservation, but you were still human and if the lord er... queen of sin should know anything it would be the lengths the survival instincts goes to in humans.

"I'm sorry... but I don't think I can." You say quietly hoping not to offend her. Of course you should have given her some credit, being the most powerful demon in all of existence has to count for some supernatural level of hearing. Although she didn't tell you that.

"Come again?" She said pretending to clean her ear.Truthfully, she thought she had this one in the bag and to hear she was wrong shocked her more then anything.

"I can't condemn myself to an eternity of torture just to delay the inevitable..." You say in a defeated tone. This was not going her way at all, she had to think of something fast.

"Aww come on, an eternity with me couldn't be that bad could it?" She said flaunting her perfect figure. This struck a cord with you though, you didn't like to be thought of as a brain dead sex machine a lot of males were portrayed to be. Sure you had your urges but you made sure to keep them in check.

"I'm not stupid, I know the stories. Hell (No pun intended) I don't know how many of them are true but my stay wouldn't as pleasant as you make it out to be." You say turning away. That was a first for Lucifer, she'd never had anyone turn her down. But this only made her want to break your resolve even more.

"Are you sure? I can take away all her pain, I could even make everyone forget that it even happened. All I need is your soul..." She said delicately before you scoffed.

"And then what? Once I'm gone you'll be free to kill her anyway, you might even make me watch as another punishment." You weren't really watching what you were saying around her even though every logical part of your brain was screaming at you to start grovelling and begging for your soul. Your sisters well-being was a touchy subject and now that she claimed she could make it all go away, didn't exactly help in the trust section. "If you could have done this at any time then why now? Why not do it the same day she was hit?" She was the first person to lie, she had all of eternity to hone that skill so how could you trust her?

"Because, only recently had you become desperate enough for me to appear without your summoning of me. That was a deal I made with my brother, that I would have claim to the desperate souls." She said with a sigh of annoyance. She was being awfully patient with you, but you could tell that it would only carry her so far.

"Why am I worth so much to you?" You ask turning around to face her again. "You could be off doing more important things, you said we didn't have time."

"That was merely an attempt to rush your decision. Do you really think that I couldn't make time, especially in a dream?" She giggled. "Oh you are so innocent, I could just eat you up!" That sent shivers down your spine, that uneasy feeling was growing by the minute and the holy façade was beginning to wear thin.

"You didn't tell me why I'm worth so much..." You say but notice the happy mood vanishes almost instantaneously.

"Why should I explain mortal?" She said, a coldness creeping into her voice. "I could rip the soul out of your frail body leaving it a lifeless husk." She said stroking you cheek with her claws... WAIT CLAWS??? You look at her hand seeing it was no different then before. Now you were paralysed, you barely even breathed as she stared into your eyes, no your very being. "I give you this option because it amuses me, the fruitlessness of life and how your kind so desperately clings to it... I cannot begin to fathom why he would bother making life in the first place if it would lead to so much suffering. It was almost as if he made my fall from his gates deliberate." A look of anger began to take over her features and you noticed something wet hit your head.

You looked up and saw the sky was blood red, the dark thunderclouds as black as the pit rained scarlet. Every drop that hit you froze you to your core as you started to hear the wailing and cries of the damned. You would have curled into a ball and waited for the end if not for lady Satan standing in front of you. Although she almost seemed to have forgotten about you being there. You found it strange that the entire scene had changed and yet her form hadn't, sure she had gotten a little taller and her eyes had gone a deep shade of black that you felt would swallow you if you stared for too long but it wasn't as bad as the environment around you.

The plants grew thorns and the sap turned to blackness that stained the ground. You shut your eyes as you felt a rough vine curl around you shin. You were, as they say, 'quaking in your boots'. You knew that praying would be useless now, your atheist lifestyle wouldn't just change with one prayer for help.

It seemed like an eternity but you felt the vine recede and the rain stop. You still didn't open your eyes until the wails of the damned were replaced by the chirps of birds. You cracked an eye open to see the scene was much the same as when you first saw her, she even looked the same again. You didn't dare speak in case this was just a trick, although something was strange about her expression... was that sadness? Before you even have a chance to register it she puts her happy face back on almost as if nothing had ever happened.

"I'll tell you what Michael...
155332222222222221222222222.title: Tell the devil 'No Dice'!

1553322222222222212222222222.content:
Although her face seemed happy and carefree, you could still feel the upset mood in the dreamy atmosphere that the absolute outrage of rejection has given Old Nikki. You dare not do anymore to get on her bad side, but you dare not change your mind either. Your sister wouldnt want it that way.

"...It that's your decision," Lucy's voice calming and soothing tone was a polar opposite to the nightmarish demeanor earlier, "I will respect it. I cant force you to sell your soul against your will... no matter how painfully easy it would be." You swallowed hard as she humbly curtsied. "...But I assure you, youre going to regret the choice you've made here. Youre still desperate. Your soul reeks of hopeless desperation."

You were scared. But as she said, she cant force you to sell your soul against your will. If she could, she wouldve just as easily TAKEN it. You tell yourself she's not as powerful as she pretends to be. She may be a fallen angel, but she's still just a guest in your dream. An unwanted guest.
"Yeah... of course, I'm desperate. I'm scared. I'm scared of you. I'm scared of what might happen to my sis at this point because I turned you down," you look Lucy in the eye and force some courage into that corner of your soul that's still shivering, "but I'm still telling you to fuck off."

"HaAaAaH!!!!"

You literally fell over in fright from the strange sound that came out of Lucy's mouth! It did not sound like something a human throat could make. You even saw her jaw unhinge and her throat contract in an awkward abnormal way to make such a sound! The sound was quite possibly the closest you thing in your life that you could describe as 'demonic'. Just that very sound she made removed all doubt that this bitch was the Devil!
In an instant, she regained her 'normal' composure and assume a surprised expression herself.

"Wow," the devil spouted, "that's the first time in a few millenniums that someone actually made me sincerely laugh!" You dont think you'll ever wanna grow up to be a professional comedian at this rate! The beautiful sweet smile she was giving you could no longer hide that show of ungodlyness earlier! You'd probably remember it for the rest of your life.

"I should keep a REAL good eye on you," she says as she giggled her dainty lady laugh, "Ahahahah... ah, your adorable little sister is lucky to have someone like you." Even though you were man enough to turn Lucifer down, you were still not happy nor relieved. Not only is your sister gonna die, but your flat out refusal didnt so much as wipe the smug smirk off her face.

"Well, sad to say we wasted too much time," Lucy said as she turned around and walked back to the gazebo, "sorry we couldnt make a great trade today. Perhaps next time, yes?"
"Dont hold your breath, Ms. Satan," you tell her.
You heard her continue to giggle as she walked, "It was an absolute pleasure to meet you, Michael. But I'm sure we'll meet again soon. Very soon." What in the heck did she mean by that?

Just as something deep down inside you cringed by whatever she meant, she stopped walking and just stood there faced away from you.

"Until then..."

*crack!* You heard a loud cracking sound as Lucy's neck bent backwards out of proportion! You would never forget the moment she twisted her head so far back that she smiled at you upside-down. Her two blue eyes became three blackened with red blood-filled pupils, boils suddenly sprouted all over her formerly serene face, tiny little animal jaws ripped opened from her cheeks, and her wide sharp crooked blood dripping teeth formed the biggest ugliest grin as she said:
"...SlEeP wElL!!!!"

*CRUNCH!!* Suddenly, a ginormous set of crooked beastly jaws snapped shut behind Lucifer, devouring the entire scene behind her! You let out the loudest blood curdling scream a boy your age could let out as you turned tell and ran like there was no tomorrow! But the jaws came even closer, consuming Lucifer and the entire scenery around her! The jaws continued to devour your dream world as they gained on you!
Oh crap! You bumped into an invisible wall! The rest of the 'garden scenery' was just painted on! You turned around and paled with so much fright, you couldnt even must the courage to scream anymore! You took one final gaze of horror as the jaws opened up one last time and came down on you!

------------------------

"Mike! Mike! Wake up!"
You were forcefully shaken up by your dad! You woke in a sudden jolt only seconds away from screaming, before waking up in the hospital room! Or rather, your SISTER'S hospital room.

"It's... it's a miracle..." you saw the doctor gasp as he stared at the heart rate monitor, "she... she has a pulse again. But... she was just..."
"Doctor! What's happening?!" your mother got restless.
"The..." the doctor was still dumbstruck, "...the heart... her heart rate... it's... beating back to normal level! But... she wouldve been declared dead only a minute ago!"

Hearing that made you immediately jump out of your seat! Did this mean your sister's not gonna die after all?!

"D-does this mean," you swallowed, "my sis is gonna live?"

"It's still too early to tell," the doctor wiped the sweat from his brow, "but it looks like we might have another chance to save her. Nurse! NURSE!!" He screamed for the nurse who quickly hauled butt on his call!
"Doctor? What is it?"
"Go get the others! Get the table ready! We're saving this little girl tonight!"
"W...wh... her?! But didnt you say she-"
"We got us a second chance! Move your ass NOW!!"
"Y-y-yes sir!"

In an irregular heart beat, the crew in scrubs dragged your sister's bed out of the room and got ready to perform the surgery that the doctor said only moments ago wouldve been waste a time. This was... you couldnt believe it! Your sister was gonna live! If such a pessimist doc like him could have a change of heart, there's no doubt in your mind that your little sis is gonna live! You wanted to shout for joy, but you didnt want to jinx it. You had to at least PRETEND to be humble.

And best of all, you STILL get to keep your soul. Guess the big bad Devil herself was nothing but smoke and mirrors! As soon as you leave the hospital, you were gonna sing 'Devil Went Down To Georgia' the whole ride home just to spite her! She can stick that gold fiddle where the Morning Star dont shine!
Everything was wonderful. Life was beautiful once again. You couldnt wait to...

...to...

.........TO.....

You didnt notice how much your jaw shivered as you gazed at the necklace on the table! The necklace with the V-shaped sigil!
Your happy go lucky mood fell from the sky and crashed into the earth and burned! Just staring at that damn necklace made you think the worst. Why else do you think Lucy left your mind gracefully when she was 'grace' was the very thing she fell from long ago?!
She had another trick up her sleeve!

'Oh my god...' you thought to yourself as you silently stared, 'please tell me she didnt...'

"Um... whose necklace is that?" you tried your best not to sound scared as you hid your scared face from view of the others.

"Oh. That's mine," answered...

1553322222222222221222121.content:
After a long day of learning and after dropping by the dining hall for some food you return to my dorm room.
Only it was completely different from what how you left it this morning. Well to be more accurate most of the stuff on your side of the room stayed the same if not organized, but more importantly everything that was on your roommates side was gone; or rather was replaced with an even larger model, the laptop was defiantly different and the Xbox one now had a ps4 companions. Then you here a feminine voice behind on your former roommate bed (déjà vu), “long time no see Ben, I am going to be your new roommate.” You turn around expecting to see your stalker from last night, however this was different woman. She did however share a few similarities with the girl before, she about your age, had red eye, a gorgeous body, and she was in a sexy pose when you find her. She did have really pale skin, almost sickly, while the stalker had a more of a tan, her hair was midnight black, her voice was a higher pitch and this time she was fully clothed.
Now you were asking yourself quite a few questions one when did your roommate move, while it is possible for a person to move out of and another person to move into a room with the help of the movers, you as the other roommate you should at least be notified beforehand, your previous roommate did not give you a reason good or bad; and the elephant in the room your new roommate is a female. While the dorm itself is co-ed the rooms themselves are grouped into gender specific quadrants, there is no way the school would do something like this without a strong reason. Second what she said “long time no see Ben”, you are very certain that this is the first time you ever met this girl so how did see already now your name. You decide to confront her on the second question first.
“Sorry miss but have few meet before, I am normally very good with remembering a face but yours is escapes me.” You weren’t lying, but you where cautious of the information you were about to give her.
“Sorry guess it has been a long time hasn’t it. My name is Veronica Foster, we first met when we were, 2 years old I believe, honestly the only reason I even remembered was because mother kept referring you as my fiancé for the last 18 years.” You probably would have believed her up till the point where she said that you were her future husband.
“Sorry, Veronica was it, but could please repeat that last part, I thought you said I was your fiancé.” You reply
“I did, mother said she and your mother set the engagement way back when, honestly I could hardly tell whether or not she was joking.”
“You know what I’ll call my mom on the subject later. I have another question at is more urgent. Tell you what I’ll let you guess what I’m going to ask.” You say will acting like a smartass.
“Why am I your new roommate right? Well your old roommate has had a death in the family and the relative had a pregnant wife and the government is not give her enough insurance money in order to raise a child and your room was the only one available.” You call total bullshit for her excuse, but if she was able to get become your roommate without the school system have a problem she either had a lot of money or a lot of friends in high, you were not going to call her bluff just yet. “Do you have any more questions Benny-boy?”
“First never call me ‘Benny’, second yes you have answered all of my questions for in terms of why you are my new roommate and how we knew each other, however ground rules will have to be made no later than tomorrow, and finally welcome to Fitchburg state.” As soon as she left you take out your phone and call home. Your mother was the first to pick up. “Hey mom I got a question, does the name Victoria Foster ring a bell?”
“Of course it does, in fact her Mother is here now, why?” Your mom replies, you note that she voice is a bit shaky.
“Really what a coincidence, may I speak with her?”
“Hello Benjamin nice to hear from you again how are you?” She sounded like some kind of upper-class woman in her mid-forties. “So are you adjusting with your life as a college student?”
“As well as one can but that’s not the reason I am calling, why is your daughter, Veronica, my new roommate? Her story sounded completely half-baked and she mentioned something about the two of us being engaged, especially during the 21st century? Care to fill in the blanks ‘mother-in-law’ because last time I checked I wasn’t in a comedic romance anime.” Normally you would handle the situation more calmly but yeah with the break in, the line of bullshit Veronica just gave you, needing to take care of advising this month, and changing your major officially, your stress level was through the fucking roof.
“Calm down tiger, you don’t want an ‘accident’ to happen now do we?” Just then you blood turns cold was as you hear the sounds of firearms being locked and loaded on the other side of the phone, and you wonder did they take your family hostage. “Now listen the engagement you have with my daughter will it may not be legit, that does not make it any less real, also we have a tradition of having shotguning a wedding, so do us a favor and start making an heir to the family please.”
You turn off your phone and start turn around to run, only to see Veronica standing there with small revolver like pistol with the door behind her being locked, and while you do have a black belt in karate if there is the one thing that your instructors it is that even though you can disarm an armed opponent at close range you should only do it if it is a complete life or death scenario. “Well crap you got me by the balls in more ways than one.”
“At least smart enough to know when to give up, remind me after our marriage to get you in shape because your brains are the only appealing thing about you.”
“Ouch that’s cold, could you at least tell me why it is me and not someone else.”
“Sorry but we cannot my family is deep it as is and that is without the hostage taking.” She replies while removing her skirt and starting to unbutton her shirt you notice the hammer on the gun is not pulled, not wanting to risk her reaction being faster than the time it would take you to bring her down you point it out.
“You do realize you have to pull back the hammer to fire the bullet right?”

There are ruins at your special place.

"How did this get here?"

Despite your hunger you explored the ruins anyway. You notice some odd monster girls drawings as you walk room to room, wandering if this was a haven or something. I mean come on only you knew where you're special place was. After about a minute you came across a portal of somesort. When you enter the portal you felt weightless as well a little sick. After your little experience with the portal, you notice the forest around you look more like a jungle.

"Ok I don't remember the trees being this big." You mutter as the portal vanish. "But man I'm hungry."

You check the surronding area to see if you can find food, or civilization. but instead you found a girl's face drops upside down directly in front of you.

"Hi!" she said.

"Wha-ahh!" You jump back.

You examine the girl who is riding a broom. She has lime green eyes, somewhat long silver hair, and wearing a blue/purple dress.

"That was amazing how you use a teleportation spell without a recall marker." The girl smiled.

"Why thank you, but I don't use an marker whatsoever." You replied. "By the way, what are you?"

"What did you mean what am I? I'm a witch one of the many monster girls that live on this world." The girl said as she get off her broom. "Wait... you mean you came here by accident?"

Your stomach growled again, and the witch chuckle when she heard it. She ask if you want to stay at her place, and you accept her offer. She introduced herself as Lily, and you introduce yourself as well. As soon Lily grab her broom, a group of...

...tall, and sexy tan skined women appeared, armed with large board swords, and longbows aimed at you, and your witch friend. You quickly hop on Lily's broom, and wrap your arms around her waist so you won't fall off.

"Switch to the sleep poison, we want that human alive." Said one of the amazons.

"Lily, who are those women?" You asked as Lily lift you two off the ground.

"Those are amazons the dwellers of this jungle, and they're here to make you their sex slave." Lily replied as she evade the toxic arrows. "You see, most monster girls would tried to rape, or even kidnap male humans to repopulate their own kind."

"Well that's not good at all." You flowned.

You, and Lily continue to dodge arrows, nets, and even magical attacks launch by the amazon tribe as the two of you fly through the jungle. There are times where Lily narrowly avoided being hit by arrows by doing barrel rolls and somersaults, and times where you thought you both would be caught by the nets, but Lily use her fire magic to burn it away. You started to hold on tighter as the witch continue to do more barrel rolls, and somersaults.

"Ok, I think it's time to end this!" Lily said as she made a U-turn.

"L-Lily? W-What are you doing?" You asked as the broom started to pick up speed.

"Showing what happens when amazons outnumber a witch." Lily smiled as she chant a spell.

You notice Lily's broom started to leave a trail of green, and blue spankles as the broom gains speed. Lily snap her fingers creating a blinding light that harmed the amazons eyes forcing them to look away, and giving you two the opportunity to escape.

"Way to go Lily, those amazons would think twice before messing with you." You smile.

"We're almost out of the jungle, just a little more." Lily said.

You were amazed at Lily skill with her magic, and her flight with her broom. You then notice the exit, and Lily continue to fly at full speed. Once you're out of the jungle, you'll be seeing a whole new world. You, and Lily...

155332222222222222221121.title: A Witch and her Boy

1553322222222222222211212.content:
Lily's home is a medieval like village that is resting between two mountains. Lily drove her broom towards the ground so both of you could enter through the gate. Once you got off of Lily's broom you notice that some of the stone buildings have blue orbs with runes around them.

"Protection in case of an emergency." Lily smiled. "Come on, my house is this way."

Lily grab your hand and guide you into her village. Most of the villagers seem to be wearing black dresses and a hat, not mentioning they all female. As you were passing each building with Lily by your side, some of the women were looking at both of you (or is it just you?) with several expressions.

"Lily they looking at us." You said in a nervous voice.

"Well... they're just wandering what kind of person you are." Lily replied. "That or we make a cute couple."

"What makes you think that?" You blush.

Lily then stopped and turned around to face you. And out of nowhere she sweetly kissed you. The some of the witches blush and nervously smiled at the scene that Lily's making, and returned to whatever they're doing. You part your lips from your witch friend with your face a deep red color.

"What was that for?" You asked.

"To bring comfort between you and my people." Lily giggled and grab your hand. "Come on it's getting dark."

The two arrive at Lily's house and she welcome you in. You made yourself home in the living room while Lily prepare dinner. The rooms were lit up by some sort of glowing orbs that act like a light source. Next to one of the orbs you notice a picture with Lily in it and several other witches. Even after what happened, you still find it hard to believe that you're in another world.

"Dinner ready, Aster." Lily called you.

You make your way to the dinner table and sit next to Lily.

"Say Aster, how did you end up in that jungle again?" Lily spoke in a sweet voice.

"Well... I uh, I just found these ruins and this portal and... well you know the rested." You replied. "Didn't you say something about a marker or something?"

"Yes, Recall and Memory are the two spells use for a one way teleportation." Lily smiled. "But both spells are useless without the other so what I don't understand is, how can a person start at point A, then get to point B without a point B to begin with?"

"W-Well... I may have an explanation, I think I was transported to another world." You said.

"Another world?" Lily tilt her head. "So... what's world you came from?"

"I don't know, uh... Earth."

"Earth? But... Earth is myth." Lily replied.

"A myth?" You spoke.

"Yeah, there are stories where monster girls travel to a world called Earth thousands of years ago." Lily explained. "But no one knows for sure."

After dinner you put away the plates and Lily invites you to bed. You enter Lily's bedroom and found a large bed that look extremely comfortable to the touch. The witch enter the room in a pink nightgown that quite revealing.

"Are you going to bed like that sweetheart?" Lily asked you.

Lily walked over you and 'helps' you remove your clothes until you're wearing nothing but your boxers. Then you both lay on the bed with Lily hugging you by your side.

"Good night Lily." You said in a soft voice.

"Good night Aster." Lily peak you on the cheek.

The glowing orbs dim and both you fell asleep.
1553322222222222222211212.title: Village of Witches, Human Population, You

"So uh, what are you going to do today?" You asked.

"Well, I was thinking of practicing some of my spells. But I want to find out how you got here." Lily replied.

Then you both heard a knock on the door. Lily got up to check who it was and it looked like a woman clad in armor of some sort.

"Um, what it is?" Lily said.

"The mistress would like to see you and that human you brought." The woman replied.

You asked who this mistress is, and Lily told you she's a high ranked witch who is also known as the holy maiden that protects the village and decide if non-witches may live here. The witch knight also told you that you need to pass a trial if she can really trust you or not.

"Hmm, sounds reasonable." You spoke.

"So you accept her challenge?" The witch knight ask.

"Yeah, I accept it, Lily saved me yesterday and I don't intend to die yet." You replied.

"Uh, the failure is banishment." The witch knight sweat drop.

"Ah well, just tell her we're be there soon." You replied.

"Haha, Aster you're funny." Lily smiled.

The witch knight nods and left to tell the mistress. After about 30 minutes you and Lily leave the house to visit the powerful witch.

155332222222222222222221.title: Izanami... or Izanami?

1553322222222222222222212.content:
You fucked up. You fucked up ROYALLY. Twice in a row, you prove that you exist only to fail. The stare in her reddened blood-filled eyes was beyond any horrible thing you have ever witness in your short life. You could’ve just given up and taken your punishment like a man. Instead you fuck up even more…

You were too curious for your own good. Ever since you found out the family secret that you descended from a clan of wizards, you felt obligated to learn magic. It started off as bending spoons, then it turned to bending pipes, then fancy magic tricks to impress your friends, then using illusions to cheat in school, then scaring away bullies with fire.

Fire. It was the 1st of your royal fuck ups. After your mother was killed by a drunk driver, you felt the urge to seek out the lush that did such a horrible thing and spook him GOOD with a nice fiery illusion. You scare him into thinking his house was on fire and barring the doors and windows shut so he couldn’t get out. Problem was, the fire wasn’t an illusion. By the time you realized the goof, you couldn’t stop the fire! By the time you realized you couldn’t stop it, the fire spread. The fire KEPT spreading all to the way to the next house and the next! Who knows how many innocent people and children were burnt to death cuz of your fuck up?

Sure, the local police couldnt explain the supernatural occurrence… but the White Council of esteemed wizards could. They knew what happened and they knew who did it. You broke the Council’s First Law of Magic. The sentence for breaking the Law is death.

Instead of accepting your end before you caused more trouble, you fled like a coward. You looked into more magic, specifically regarding how to raise the dead to reverse the murders you committed. You withdrew a huge chunk of your life savings and began your research to bring back the innocent lives you carelessly taken.

Your research took you all the way to Okinawa, Japan… to a nice little Shinto shrine that according to the black scriptures used to be the gateway to Yomi, the land of the dead. You played yourself off as a friendly tourist taking pictures, buying souvenirs, pretending to listen to the tour guide’s history lesson in broken English, and even sweet-talking the cute young black haired Miko sweeping the steps. Sure, she probably couldnt understand you, but by the way she smiled and bowed as you spoke, she was flattered.

Then after reading a little more from the black scriptures, you gave a hefty donation to the Miko elder and she gave you permission to pray and meditate in private for an hour. During that hour alone, you set up shop. Poured salt on the ground into a big circle, placed the spell bearing stones around the circle, lit a few candles, gripped your mother’s amulet tight, and squat in the circle, concentrating your power.

You cleared your mind and chanted the words so that the spirits of the netherworld could you hear you, wishing to bring back those who have fallen. You expressed your regrets and sympathies and offered to make amends for your misdeeds, inviting them to join you.

The circle glowed bright! The candles lit black flames! The earth rumbled! A cold, chilling wind began to blow! You felt a powerful force shake you out of your meditation! Something deep down inside you told you somebody or something heard that invitation! Something BAD! It ripped the shrine in half!
This was your 2nd fuck up!

“Nani?!” the cute black haired miko ran to you, obviously shocked at what’s going on, “Nani goto?! Nanika atta?!”
“GET OUTTA HERE!” you screamed to her, “GO!! QUICK!!” Too late. The miko froze in horror at what was behind you. You felt the icy chill of death itself from that direction. You turned around and paled at the sight of the tall ungodly black haired silhouette in a burnt and tattered pink kimono standing before you.

It was female. What was left of it, anyway. The majority of her was wrapped in bandages, but the parts of her that wasnt was burnt and scarred beyond recognition! White snakes slithered around her body and through her exposed gaping wounds.
She wore a white maiden kabuki mask covering what you knew wasnt much of a face left! Her reddened bloodfilled eyes gazed into with intrigue, filling you with absolute regret of what you just did!

“Oh my god… oh my god!”
You knew who she was and you cursed the black scriptures for lying to you! She was Izanami-no-Mikoto, the Shinto goddess of the dead. What was once a lovely divine deity responsible for creating this part of the world with her husband was now a charred, heartbroken ill elder god who spent WAY too long in Hell!

You heard Izanami pant almost exhaustedly under her mask. It looked as though she wasnt to speak, but wasnt able to. Her throat muscles must be too damaged to do so.

The Miko behind you shrieked and ran, but one of the white snakes slithered out of Izanami‘s ribcage and zipped at the poor girl, sinking it‘s fangs into her!!

“NO!!” you screamed. AGAIN someone suffers because of you.
Her eyes rolled back, but she wasnt dead. A kanji seal appeared on her forehead. The poor miko stepped toward you in a hypnotic daze and faced you, despite her eyes being rolled back!
"What in the hell..." before you could finish that sentence, you felt the similar chill emitting from the miko that's emitting from Izanami herself.

"GaIjIn MaHo TsUkAi..." the chilling voice coming from Miko's mouth was not her own, "O-mAnEkI aRiGaTo..." Izanami must be using the miko girl as an anchor to speak to you. Problem is you forgot to bring your translation book! This is embarrassing! You not only freed a fallen god from Hell, but you cant even speak her language!

"I-I-I'm sorry," you stuttered, "I dont understand you."
Izanami tilted her head with intrigue and stared at you in silence for a moment.

"pErDóNaMe PoR fAvOr," the miko suddenly started speaking Spanish! "eStA cOmPrEnDe AqUi, ExTrAnJeRo?"
You blinked in amazement. But you should probably expect nothing less from a god. Still, you dont understand Spanish.
"I'm sorry, I still dont understand."

Izanami put a rotted finger to the chin of her mask in thought...

"DoEs ThIs LaNgUaGe SuIt YoUr LiKiNg, FoReIgN wIzArD?" the Miko suddenly spoke english!
You swallowed hard, holding back the urge to panic, but nodded.

Izanami's bloodfilled eyes widened as she slowly stepped toward you. A white snake poked out of her open stomach and hissed your way.
"WiZaRd..." the Miko spoke with a hint of curiosity, "...FoR wHaT pUrPoSe hAvE yOu DaReD tO oPeN tHe GaTeWaY tO hElL aNd FrEeD mE fRoM mY EtErNaL iMpRiSoNmEnT?"
That was a good question. You were far too terrified of Izanami to answer.
'This wasnt supposed to happen!' you thought to yourself, 'I just wanted to bring back the people I killed by accident! I didnt mean to free a dead god!"

"AnSwEr My QuEsTiOn!!" the Miko shouted as Izanami squinted her eyes with impatience, "wHy HaVe yOu, a LoWlY yEt PoWeRfUl fOrEiGn WiZaRd, SuMmOnEd ThE gOdDeSs Of ThE dEaD bAcK iNtO tHe LiViNg ReAlM?"

It was nerve wrecking just to think of an answer to that question. You were asked by a god of death, after all! Your knees began to shiver from her chilling approach. Izanami was in no mood to wait. But you were in no mood to answer, either.

What could you possibly do? Do you dare answer her question?
1553322222222222222222212.title: She Who Invites

15533222222222222222222121.content:
{blue = you, red = Izanami}

At that moment, you found your voice. And, even tough you were nervous and terrified of her, you had to tell her the truth. So you gulped and breathed hard, as you kneeled before her.

"The truth, Izanami-sama, is that I never intended to summon you in the first place."

Izanami was surprised by this statement, ana she was also surprised by the fact you called her "Izanami-sama", but remained silent. You took her silence as a sign to continue.

"According to the scrolls and ancient incantations, the spell I did was suposed to bring back dead people. Not to revive the Goddess of the Dead."

"Why did you wanted to bring the dead back?", she asked, in a calmer tone and with curiosity in her voice.

"Well... To be honest, it's beacause I did something REALLY bad with my magic powers. Sometime ago, my mother was killed by someone. I wanted revenge so, I when't to his house, planning to scare him with illusionary fire. Scare him so much, that he would never do something like that again. But things went completely wrong."

"Let me guess. Instead of scaring him, you kkilled him, right?"

"Yes. But thats not the only bad thing that happened."

"What do you mean?"

"Well... At first, everything was goin according to the plan. But then the fire incrased. By the time I noticed the fire was real, the it was to late to save the man and the house. I tried to extinguish the fire but, to no avail. By the time the fire extinguished itself, a large number of houses was burned. And so were the people inside of them. So, I hidded myself from the White Wizard Coulncil and began to research and to focus in magic to resurrect people."

"I see. So you wanted to bring bach those people you killed, right?"

"Yes. Wheter they forgave me or not, I didn't cared. I just wanted to make things right and give back to them what I had taken."

After you told her this, her expression was hard to read. But it seemed to a mix of...
15533222222222222222222121.title: Answer her question.

155332222222222222222221212.content:
Confessing a sin to an actual god was a lot more nerve wrecking than the churches led you to believe. You expected Izanami to be furious, to bring down the hammer of damnation on you for doing something so horrible in your life. You thought that what the goddess of the dead would do to you would make you WISH you accepted the White Council's execution!

However, you saw no hint of anger or fury behind the goddess's mask. If anything, the dim look in her bloodfilled eyes seemed less threatening than before. If you had to make a very educated guess, you'd think this was a hint of merciful understanding she was showing you. She stepped a tad bit closer, but you did not step back.
"hOw NoBlE..." the possessed step-sweeping Miko spoke to match Izanami's visual expression, "...iF nOt FoOlisH. tEll mE, foReIgN wIzArD. wHaT mAdE yOu AsSuMe YoU wErE cApAbLe oF dEfYiNg tHe dIvIdE oRdEr Of LiFe AnD dEaTh?" Fair question. Unfortunately, you didnt have the answer. What did make you assume you could pull off such an impossible task that not even the White Council in their centuries of existing couldve pulled off?!

"I..." you swallowed hard and bowed your head, "...I dont know, Izanami-sama."
"wHaT mAdE yOu ThInK tHaT yOuR pLaN wOuLd NoT bAcKfirE?" another good point! Izanami tilted her head as the miko continued, "Or ThAt YoUr SpELL wOuLd NoT bRiNg To LiFe ThOsE ThAt ShOuLDnT Be? LiKe ThE uNdEaD aRmY oR dEvILs... or..." you could imagine Izanami barely making a smirk under her mask, "...aN aNgRy VeNgEfUL GoDdEsS wHoSe RaGe Is FuELd By EtErNaL AbAnDoNmEnT iN tHe BoWeLs Of YoMi?!"
"I didnt," you humbly admitted, "all I had was blind faith." You even a nervous grin, "...Guess I'm not really cut out for the whole wizard deal, huh? Mom must be rolling in her grave right about now." You felt depressed now. Looking back, you know your mom wouldnt have wanted it this way. She must be very disappointed in you right now... wherever she is. Why oh why couldnt you have just left well enough alone?!

As you thought about her, Izanami stared at you in absolute silence, minus her heavy panting. Her chill was still making you shiver. Youre depressed and terrified of the potential horrors you now released into the world.
Despite your fear, you couldnt help but find it cute the way the burnt goddess was bending over and tilted her head at you in some sort of a cute curious pose.

"wHAt Is YoUr NaMe, WiZaRd?" she finally asked your name.
No use to cover your identity from a fallen god, "...[Jeremiah]. [Jeremiah] Westwayne."
"ArE yOu AfRaId Of Me... JeReMiAh?" the possessed miko asked.
"I am," you said with brutal honesty.
You could see Izanami squint her eyes as her human-puppet spoke, "...YeT yOu StILL sTaNd BeFoRe Me?" You didnt even budge where her icy cold bandaged hand lifted your chin up as she gazed into you at point-blank range! "eVeN mY fOrMeR hUsBaNd RaN fRoM mE sCrEaMiNg WhEn He FiRsT sAw ThIs." Izanagi... "a LoWlY mOrTaL wIzArD wItH A BiGgEr SpInE tHaN a GoD..." You could her eyes squint in some sort of a gleeful expression. You assume whatever face she had left had a rather wide grin behind that mask, "...InTErEsTiNG..."

Right on cue with the potentially evil goddess's intrigue, the earth shook once more. Tremors turned into cracks in the ground. Cracks turned into holes. Holes turned into deep gaping chasms. Several silhouettes crawled out of those chasms. It was difficult to fathom the figures outside of their shadowy silhouettes, but it'd probably be best you couldnt fathom them.
Each silhouette had a different bizarre of grotesque feature. Long batlike wings, long furry arms and knuckles like a gorilla, fangs almost the size of their head, long spiney centipede abdomens, or limbs replaced with slithering spikey appendages... whatever they were, they werent of this world.

Izanami stood back up and looked down at you while her white snake slithered atop her shoulder staring as well.
"WeStWaYnE-sAn..." she actually addressed you formally... or at least the miko did, "I aM iN yOuR dEbT fOr FrEeInG mE fRom tHE bOwElS oF YoMi." Those words offered relief. A lot of relief. "tO rEpAy YoU... I WiSh tO EmPlOy YoUr SeRvIcEs."
Relief changed to caution. You said nothing. Employing your services could mean anything.

"I iNtEnD tO rEcLaIm My GLOrIuS LaNd oF tHe RiSiNg SuN..." Izanami's puppet claimed, "...aNd ReStOrE iT tO iT'S nAtUrAL LUstEr."
...Your eyes widened. In that brief sentence, you summed up her intentions!
"You wanna take over Japan?!"
"RECLAIM iT," the possessed miko corrected and heavily emphasized the word, "TeChNiCaLLy, It iS MiNe By BiRtHrIghT."
The horde of creepy silhouettes gathered around the destroyed shrine. Each set of glowing eyes gazed your way (sets ranged from 1 to upwards of 8 eyes a silhouette). Bad. BAD. BAAAAAADDDDD!!!!

Izanami extended her arm to you, "I InViTE yOu To JoIn Me... aS mY ChAmPiOn KnIgHt."
"Y...Your knight?!" you flinched at the word. On instinct, you gripped your mother's amulet tightly, "you want me to help you rule Japan?!"
"I DeEm YoU tHe MoSt WoRtHy," she acts as if that's a blessing to you! "Do ThIs FoR mE... aNd I sHaLL pErSoNaLLy sEe To It ThAt ThE LiVeS yOu'Ve TaKeN aRe ReStOrEd."

That offer keen your interest. She'd bring back the people you inadvertently killed? Can she do that?!
You tried to keep your cool and not look TOO excited by that offer, "You... you will honestly do that for me... Izanami-sama?"

Izanami... bowed. You felt a spiritual sense of assurance when a goddess bowed to you.

"YoU hAvE mY SoLeMn PrOmIsE," the puppet vowed, "wILL yOu AcCePt mY InViTaTiOn... mY kNiGhT?"

You thought about it. You thought hard, but you couldnt think long. To say it was a tempting offer would be putting it mildly. But it was at the cost at potentially putting a foreign nation in danger at the hands of a fallen god. The White Council would never forgive you at this rate... but you'd be under the protection of one of Japan's senior deities.

But whether or not the 'protection' was worth it remains to be seen. How badly did you want to save those poor innocent souls lost? Would it be worth possibly putting more innocent souls at risk?
155332222222222222222221212.title: You are cordially invited to Eternity.

choices: Your gained powers and your body changed (reserved).
You gained powers but your body stays the same.
1553322222222222222222212121.content:
(Note: I've decided to change the name of the main character to Leon Sparrow It's just that Jeremiah Westwayne dosen't seem to fit the main character).

The creatures that surrounded you and Izanami stopped advancing and stood there. As if they were waiting for Izanami's command. Izanami was offering you a chance for you to redeem for your mistakes. But to conquer Japan? Even if it was supposed to be hers, what about the people that live here now?

"It's a very tempting offer, Izanami-sama. But..."

"But?", she asked.

"If I am to help you taking back Japan, besides of the promess you already made, I need something else.", you said with a firm yet respectful voice.

"And what would that be?", asked Izanami, surprised by your voice's tone.

You raised your head, looked into Izanami's eyes and said:

"I need you to promise that no innocent will be harmed. If innocent people need to be harmed or killed to reach your goal, then I want no part on this."

Izanami was both, surprised and impressed by what you asked for. She never thought you would make such a noble request. She looked at you, smiled and said:

"Very well. You have my word. no innocent will be harmed. Now, I shall ask you one last time. Do you accept my request?"

You looked down and thought about it.

*Such a tempting offer. I would have the protection of a goddess. And the best part of it, I'll be able to fix and redeem my mistakes. Besides, she seems nice even if she is the goddess of the dead. Also, it's so strange. Somehow, I feel attracted to her.*

You look into her eyes once again and say:

"I have made my decision, Izanami-sama."

"What have you decided, Sparrow-san?"

Instead of answering right away, you bent down on you knee, as a knight would do and said:

"I solemnly swear upon my immortal soul that I, Leon Sparrow, shall serve thy, Izanami-no-Miko, as your knight and aid you in achieving your goal. And I shall do so until my either, the goal is achieved or my services are no longer necessary for thy, watashi no Megami-sama.", as you said the last word, you picked Izanami's hand and kissed it, to show your loyalty.

Izanami was impressed by the whole ordeal! She expected a simple "Yes" or "I accept". She never expected for you to make an oath or for you to vow to her!

"And I accept thou, Leon Sparrow, as my champion knight. And I, Izanami-no-Miko, solemnly swear to keep my word of reviving the ones that thou hast killed and to spare the lives of the innocent. And thou shall be my knight until our goal is achieved or until thy services are no longer necessary for me."

When she said the last word, commanded her puppet to come to her and to give her a cutting object. The puppet did as she was commanded and handed a knife she had in the waist of her clothes. Izanami then asked you to give her your hand and she raised her own hand. She then used the knife to make two small cuts, one in your middle finger and one in her's.

"For the vow to be complete, you must drink a drop of my blood and you must drink a drop of my blood."

You did so, and then, something began to happen.

What was happening?
1553322222222222222222212121.title: Accept Izanami's invitation.

choices: go to your place. I'd like to learn more about you and your family." (reserved)
plan what our first step to take back Japan should be."
15533222222222222222222121211.content:
After you drank Izanami's blood, you fell on you knees and began to feel something inside of you. It wasn't anything unpleasant, like pain. But it wasn't pleasant either.

"Ugh... I feel... strange. What's happening to me, Izanami-sama?"

"Since you drank my blood, you are gaining powers. But, I do not know how they will affect you or or you body, Sparrow-san."

Suddenly, a strange and intense red aura began to emanate from you body. The aura became more and more intense and bright until you where completely engulfed by it and couldn't be seen. When the aura engulfed you, Izanami began to worry about you.

"Sparrow-san?! Sparrow-san, can you hear me?! SPARROW-SAN!!!"

You couldn't answer due to the transformations your were going through. You felt that your body started to change. You gained more bulk, your nails became wolf-like claws, your hair became so long that it reaches the end of your back and it became silver in color. Your canines became fangs, many rune-like symbols appeared in you arms and torso. Three sets of red claw-like marks appeared in your face and your eyes became blood red with slithed, black pupils (like those of Akashia Moka from Rosario+Vampire in her inner form when she's really angry, check episode 12 from season 1). In the meanwhile, Izanami was still calling for you, worried.

"Sparrow-san! Please answer me, Sparrow-san!!!"

She was as worried for you, like someone would worry for their most beloved one. Then, suddenly, the aura around you started to diminish until you were somewhat visible again. Then, Izanami, recognizing you form, started to run in you direction, relieved.

"Sparrow-san! Are you alright?", she asked, stopping right in front of you.

"Yes, Izanami-sama. I'm okay. But I feel different."

Then, the aura vanished completely.

"*gasp*! Sparrow-san?! Is that you?!"

"Yes, Izanami-sama. Why?"

"No wonder you feel different."

"What do you mean? How do I look?"

"Well... Personally, I think you look quite good. *And quite handsome, too* But I think you should judge that. Here, take a look at yourself.", she said blushing behind of her mask.

She then summoned a full-body mirror with obsidian colored borders and put it in front of you.

"GASP!!! Wow...", was the only thing you managed to say, at first.

"So? What do you think?"

"I... I don't know how to put it in words, Izanami-sama. I can hardly believe that the image in the mirror is me. Still, after seeing you, the goddess of the dead herself and you possessing someone, I guess seeing myself transformed like this shouldn't surprise me so much."

"*Giggles*. Maybe so. But tell me, do you like your new form?"

"Yes, Izanami-sama. I do. Judging by the fangs and by the affinity I now feel towards bats, I'm assume I'm a vampire or half vampire, right?"

"Indeed. Still, I feel your transformation is not complete."

"Eh? So, this isn't my full form?

"Exactly."

"I see. Now that I think about it, while I was transforming,I felt like something in my back and also right at the end of my back wanted to come out but, whatever those things were, something, maybe my own body, stopped them from coming out. But, although I'm not sure, I have an idea of what they were."

"Is that so? And what do you think those things were, Sparrow-san?

"If what I know of the japanese mythology is correct, then I assume that it would be a pair of wings and tail."

"Hmm... Interesting. Still, for someone who's not from Japan, you know quite a lot, don't you, Sparrow-san?"

"I said I'm not from Japan. But, that dosen't mean that I haven't studied and learned about it and it's culture. I was always fascinated by the japanese culture. Especially the music, mythology, folklore and fiction. Also, vampires are something common to many cultures, though they have many differences from one culture to another."

"I see. You mentioned that you liked music first. So, I assume you like music more the the rest, don't you?"

"Indeed. But not only the japanese music. I always really loved music, since I was a little kid."

"How unusual. You are quite an interesting person, Sparrow-san." she said, smiling.

"Thank you, Izanami-sama.", you said, blushing thanks to the compliment, but you trying to hide it.

"You're welcome. And you if you want to hide something, like the way your blushing, which I think it's quite cute, then I suggest you try harder next time, my champion knight.", she said giggling like a high school student.

That comment only made you blush more.

"Tee hee! How cute! I really like the way you blush! I can see that I'm going to have quite a lot of fun with you, Sparrow-san."

"I think that with that "having fun with you", you mean both, actually having fun with me and teasing me, don't you?"

"Bingo! The hee! How did you knew?"

"I had some experiences like those with Onee-san."

"Ah. So you have a sister, hmm? Interesting. I'd like to meet her, some day, if you don't mind."

"Not at all, Izanami-sama. Rather, I'd be honored!"

"Sparrow-san...", she said, blushing again. Tough, again, it was hidden by her mask.

"So, what do we do now?"

"Hmm... I think we should...
15533222222222222222222121211.title: Your gained powers and your body changed (reser...

155332222222222222222221212111.content:
"I think we should go to your place, Sparrow-san. I'd like to learn more about my champion knight and his family."

"!!!"

"Something wrong, Sparrow-san?", she asked when she saw your shocked expression.

"No, Izanami-sama. It's just that... Is it really okay to waste time and fool around? Shouldn't we think about how to get Japan back?"

"Yes. But there is plenty of time for that. After all, I am a goddess and you will live for a long time as well. Besides, I don't think learning about my Knight is a waste of time.", she said matter of factually.

"Izanami-sama...", you say, flattered.

"Well then, shall we get going, Sparrow-san?"

"As you wish, Izanami-sama.", you said, bowing.

"Before we go, tough. Where do you live, Sparrow-san?"

"Well. I live here, in Japan. In Okinawa, close to the mountains."

"But I thought you said you weren't from Japan?", said Izanami, in confusion.

"I wasn't born in Japan. But I have been living here for a year and a couple of months."

"Ah. I see. But then, why didn't you understood me when I first spoke to you?"

"Well... At that moment, I was pretty nervous and scared of you so, I couldn't quite organize my thoughts to talk to you in japanese."

"I see. Anyway, let's get going. I really wish to leave this shrine."

"Alright then. Please follow me, Izanami-sama."

Now, do you, reader, wish for the long and detailed version of Leon's and Izanami's journey to Leon's home? Or do you wish for a short version?
